title: Exceeded Expectations!!
text: Just came back from my trip to New York and must say that this hotel that I pick up by chance was one of the best I ever stay in. It has such a good vibe. The design, the ambience, the staff always so nice even the ones that don’t speak English are always smiling. The croissants and bagels early in the morning are such a nice detail that we were not expecting and made our days. Very good value for money!

title: Vacation
text:
The hotel is amazing
Perfect location 
The hotel and the room was very clean
The best part I liked about the room is no carpet 
The staff is very friendly and helpful 
The complimentary morning pastries were great
Thank you for make my stay wonderful 
I will be back.

title: Great experience
text: This hotel is so cute! The coffee & tea area it is so cozy and feels like our own home . The staff is amazing, always smiling  and giving such good suggestions for bars and restaurants such as Serafina and Park Tavern near by the hotel. So good ! Rooms are small but it’s New York standard. However the bed is so comfortable . A place to come back for sure!

title: Recent stay
text: The hotel has  a welcome atmosphere, the design of the hotel is cute, peaceful environment, the location is excellent, central to everything, grand central station 5 minutes away and the service is exceptional. The coffee machine, water machine and pastry are valuable for the stay.

title: Great experience.
text: Very nice and neat room. Bed was made everyday without requesting. Free light breakfast included with fancy coffee machine. Very close to timesquare and other tourist attraction. Staff members are very friendly and helpful. Would come back again.

title: Best view of Park Avenue
text:
Best view in Park Avenue! My room on the 22nd floor had the most surreal balcony with breathtaking views of the Empire State Building. From there you can see the essence of New York City and at night you can 100% feel the magic of the city that doesn't sleep!
The hotel is super clean, with very nice and caring staff who are always ready to give recommendations on what to see and enjoy in the city. I loved the recommendation for Mulligan's, an Irish pub nearby with great ambiance and amazing food! It's a must-visit if you're visiting the city and would rather stay in a quieter area but close enough to most of the attractions.

title: Like at home
text:
We just came back from an amazing stay at Pestana Park Avenue. It's an incredibly cozy hotel with super nice staff. The take-and-go area with coffee and tea making facilities throughout the day was the cherry on top! But the best thing about this area is the cozy home feeling. It's like a beautifully designed little kitchen, with free fresh bagels and croissants in the morning!

I want to talk about the staff again. They were out of this world and even though some of them didn't speak perfect English, their smiles and politeness made me and my boyfriend's stay even better during our stay. This will be my best hotel in New York and I will definitely be back!

title: best choice of hotel
text:
gorgeous location! nice staff! 
Although the room is a bit small, the bathroom is not cramped, which was nice. Isn't it enough to just unpack the suitcase in Manhattan? The croissants and bagels provided in the morning, along with the cozy restaurant available 24 hours, were really nice. When I got tired from visiting museums, I came back to rest and then went out again. I really want to recommend the hotel's location!

title: Great value
text:
Lovely place with very friendly and helpful staff. Convenient location, smooth check in process, clean rooms. Close to Grand Central station with lots of bars and restaurants walkable.

Thank you to Gregory at the front desk! Would stay again.

title: Wonderful gem of a hotel in NYC‼️‼️‼️‼️
text:
Great stay at the Pestana!! Staff so welcoming & helpful, room good size and really comfy bed shower was best we've ever experienced when travelling😁
Will definitely stay again and recommend to all our friends, location also superb 5 mins from the station & Times square👍

title: Great location
text: Great location  , staff friendly. Great room , good night sleep on comfy bed, ground floor there is coffee machine , bagels and croissants every morning. Hotel is quiet , highly recommend.turn right when you come out of hotel and right again and it puts you on 42nd street ideal for grand central, the rock, Bryant park, library, times square, Central Park

title: Exceptionally clean and Comfortable
text: 5/5 hotel is exceptionally clean and Comfortable. The staff were very helpful and friendly.  The rooms were small but adequate.  The hotel was centrally located and just round the corner from. Grand Central terminal for trains and subways.  I would recommend this hotel and I would stay there again.

title: Wonderful Hotel!
text: I loved the hotel, the rooms are super comfortable and have everything you need for a good stay in NY. The location is the best. The staff are super attentive to everyone. The hotel takes great care of everything, water and coffee are always available and there is food for breakfast. I would especially like to thank the Hotel Director who was always super attentive to us.

title: Amazing!!
text: Hotel very well located, excellent conditions both in terms of breakfast and all amenities. As for the room, despite being a little small (which is normal in New York), it is very pleasant, the bed is very comfortable and the Wi-Fi works really well. A special thank you to the Accommodation Director Judite for all her friendliness and professionalism.

title: A perfect place to stay!
text:
The Pestana is just lovely. The staff were so friendly and helpful, especially the manager who went  out of her way to make sure our stay was excellent. She even saw us out walking when she was off work and said hi. There are only four rooms on each floor so it was very quiet and peaceful. The rooms are not large but it was easy to organize all my stuff to fit in the space (I had a lot of luggage for work) so the size of the room was totally fine. There is plenty of light from the big window and a nice flat screen tv. The bed was super comfortable and I slept well. Even in NYC it was quiet at night. It’s easy to walk from the hotel to wherever you need to go. 
I will be doing more work in NYC and will definitely stay at the Pestana again. It’s a hidden little gem in in the city!

title: Great location in New York
text: Great location, with an excellent service and staff. Glad to have spent a week in New York at this hotel. All the commodities and expectations were met and even surpassed. Highly recommend a stay athe Pestana Park Avenue in New York. Also the bagels and croissants are great!

title: Lovely staff and excellent location
text:
Excellent location for the hotel, we did not want to be in a busy area so this was perfect as it was not loud like Times Square but very central for grand central, and within walking distance of 5th avenue and other attractions.

The room itself was great, the bed was very comfortable and large with excellent daily housekeeping. The only downside would be lack of drawers, but as it was just the two of us we could manage.

The staff were extremely welcoming and friendly, offering tips and advice of where to go. The Operations Manager went out of her way to give my partner a 30th birthday message and cake and was lovely on check out.

Would highly recommend this hotel and we will definitely stay there if/when we come back to New York!

title: Lovely Stay
text: Stayed for a week. Excellent from start to finish, nice size rooms especially for a Solo traveller. The room has everything you could need. Incredibly helpful staff and excellent location (a short walk from Grand central terminal) which proved valuable. Very clean place. Would love to come back again.

title: Good but small/narrow
text: Nice price/location. The rooms are nice but very very small. Like there is no room to set anything down and large suitcases have no place to go. The balcony is nice (and rare in NYC) but there is not seating, limiting its usefulness.  The sink is TINY. But it is worth staying.

title: Super, central, cosy, stylish
text: Great hotel, central spot and easy to get around midtown sights and shops. Lovely room, great shower, toiletries provided, cosy bed, great sheets. Every member of staff we met were so friendly and helpful, and the coffee and croissants in the morning are brilliant.

title: Wonderful Stay at Pestana Park Avenue
text:
We stayed here for a week on a trip to NYC for my partner's 30th birthday. We couldn't recommend the hotel enough! The staff were amazing- so friendly and helpful, and they organised prosecco and a birthday cake in the room for my partners birthday. As we were there over Valentine's Day, there were also chocolates in the room for us on that day.

The location of the hotel is brilliant, just a couple of minutes walk from Grand Central which made getting to the hotel from the airport really easy. Other sights are all well within walking distance such as the Empire State, Central Park and Rockefeller Centre.

The hotel itself is great, the rooms are clean and have excellent facilities. We even had a garment steamer in our room. The room was spotlessly clean. On top of this, the hotel offers 24/7 coffee making facilities downstairs, as well as a Nespresso machine in the room. There is also bagels and pastries available each morning which we thought was excellent to be able to get breakfast at a hotel in New York! 

We would certainly stay here again if we return to New York. Thank you to al at Pestana for a perfect stay!

title: Perfect Location
text:
We booked the hotel in advance directly on the hotel website (also got 10% discount by joining the Pestana Guest Club) for 4 nights in early Feb'24 in a Superior Room.  We were travelling to see Billy Joel on the friday night at Madison Square Garden and the hotel was the perfect location and a 20 mins walk to MSG (& Penn Station). 
We had several communications with the hotel prior to arrival and all answered promptly. We checked in around 4pm on the Thursday afternoon after travelling from the UK via Newark (we got the Airtrain then train into Penn Station and walked from there to the hotel in c.20 mins.). 
Very pleasant and informative check in advising us about the bagels,  pastries and coffees available in the ground floor dining area from early morning, the water in the room, wifi and mini bar /fridge.
Our room was on the 20th floor where we had a slither of  view of the Chrysler Building.
The room is not huge, but having stayed in NYC hotels on numerous occasions, none of them are (unless you pay big bucks). We had a large comfortable bed, USB slots at the bedside as well as bedside lamps. There's storage under the bed with huge drawers at each side instead of a stand up drawer storage unit. Also there's several coat hangers for storing clothes behind the mirror and door. There's a small sink in the main room area next to the door to the shower room. Shower was large and great water pressure with toiletries provided.
There's a mini bar / fridge in the room. We purchased drinks outside and used it to store them and the large bottle of water provided for each stay. We taut moved the mini bar items out and put them back before check out. 
The TV can link to your Firestick or phone to access Netflix / Prime etc.
The location of the hotel is perfect - 5 mins walk to Grand Central Terminal; 25 mins to edge of Central Park on 5th Avenue; 25 mins walk to Hudson Yards and start o the High Line; 30 mins from the Roosevelt Island Tram; 10 mins from the Empire State Building and 20 mins from Madison Square Garden.
Check out was easy and as we didn't need to return to the airport until later the night we left our luggage at the hotel before returning later in the day before some final sightseeing.
Perfect location. Friendly helpful staff. Nice clean room with comfortable bed and great shower. Decent price during the low season of February 2024.

title: Excellent emplacement, mais chambres petites et bruyantes
text:
Hôtel très bien placé, avec un personnel aux petits soins.
Par contre cet excellent classement ne me semble pas justifié. Deux points négatifs importants pour moi.
Le premier est le manque d étagère ou de rangement. En effet la chambre est très petite, et il n y a par exemple pas la moindre possibilité de poser quelque chose à côté du lavabo. Et donc absolument aucun rangement.
Le deuxième point beaucoup plus gênant est le bruit. On entends rien de l extérieur, mais par contre en intérieur on connaît toute la vie des voisins, de ce qui se passe sur le pallier, et quand le chauffage se mets en route cela réveille toute la chambre !

title: Stop searching, and stay here!
text: Best Valentine’s Day getaway!! Stayed here for one night and had an incredible view in the balcony room. Stunning views, and incredible service from the staff. Camila greeted us upon arrival and was a true delight. Would happily recommend the Pestana on Park Ave as the perfect stay in a well-located area of NYC.

title: Excellent hotel in the center of New York
text:
Excellent hotel in the center of New York.
Staff very friendly and available to the customer.
Rooms, although small, very comfortable and clean.
A very positive note for the fact that they have a free light breakfast in the morning, with croissants and baigals. Throughout the day they always have tea, coffee and milk available for guests. It's hard to find that nowadays.
Another very positive point is the location, 5 minutes from Central Station and in the heart of the main area of NY.
A hotel to return to for sure.
Excellent value for money.

title: Très bon hôtel
text: Très contents de notre séjour dans cet hôtel qui est très bien situé (à une rue de Grand Central). Le personnel est très gentil et accueillant. La chambre était bien isolée du bruit. Seul bémol le système d’aération bruyant qui se déclenche fréquemment.

title: Una estancia maravillosa!
text:
El hotel está muy limpio y es muy acogedor. Las habitaciones no son muy grandes pero son funcionales y modernas. 
Por las mañanas hay en una de las zonas comunes croissants y bagels, además de una máquina de café, totalmente gratis, es un gran detalle.
Aunque lo mejor de todo es el staff, muy amables y atentos.
Recomendable 100%, una experiencia genial.

title: Amazing experience - great location, price, service!
text: This was the perfect hotel when it came to location, walkability, affordability, and most of all…TOP NOTCH SERVICE! Highly recommend. You’re also so close to the metro, you can go anywhere very easily. Can’t wait to come back! Stay here to be near the action and get everything you want from a hotel.

title: Dias perfeitos em NYC
text: Hoje é meu último dia hospedada no Pestana e tudo o que tenho para falar é que foi tudo maravilhoso, todos os dias o quarto muito bem arrumado, colcha de cama e colchão perfeito para descansar após o dia todo andando nas ruas de New York kkk e uma bela cozinha completa para tomar um cafezinho para esquentar nos dias frios, atendimento maravilhoso. Com certeza eu voltaria.

title: Lovely hotel in NYC
text:
My partner and I loved our stay at Pestana Park Avenue! Big thank you to Judith and her team for the incredible service.

The location is very convenient and central to most attractions we had planned on our visit to NYC. It is also very close to Grand Central St, if you plan on using the subway system.

title: A pleasurable week
text: My recent week-long stay at Pestana Park Avenue Hotel was superb. The rooms were modern and comfortable, and the location on Park Avenue was ideal for exploring the city. A special shout-out to Ruan, whose exceptional hospitality truly made my stay memorable. Highly recommend this hotel for both business and leisure travelers.

title: Lovely hotel
text:
Well located, clean and comfortable hotel. We could not have wanted anything better for our short NYC bday trip.
Juan and Judite are extremely friendly.
The croissants and coffee, which are courtesy of the hotel every morning, are of good quality.
I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Stay to forget
text: I stayed at this hotel for 3 nights together with colleagues attracted by the great reviews and very affordable price. Honestly I found the rooms decorated in a bizarre way : a huge bathroom with toilet and shower but the sink was outside located in the bedroom. The room was not equipped with a wardrobe but a hanger on the wall. Now I can appreciate the modernity and  be original but here you can understand that the architect doesn’t travel too much. We had also the bad luck to have even 2 nights without heating. Now I can understand that there may be accidents but two nights seems a little too much for a Boutique hotel. Friendly staff.

title: 1 Semaine a NYC
text: Hotel très bien situé au coeur de Manatthan , proche de time square, 5 eme avenue et empire state building. Au calme malgré la proximité du centre, très propre, personnel très agreable et chambre très bien aménagée. Nous recommandons sans problème!

title: Clean and friendly! Would stay again
text:
Such a great hotel! The staff are so friendly and courteous, and the location can't be beat. It's only a few minutes' walk away from Grand Central Terminal, Bryant Park, NYPL, and 5th Avenue. 

We initially booked a cozy/cabin room on their website, which was a bunk bed situation. For two adults, it felt cramped, and we asked if we could upgrade to a larger room. Keener was receptive to our request and managed to get us a free upgrade to a classic room, which felt more spacious and had room to sit (much needed after a ton of walking!) The staff also were accommodating of our request to hold our luggage after check-out so we could explore the area.

Both rooms were clean and modern. The shower and sink were top-notch, with great water pressure. My main gripe was that most of the hooks in the rooms did not have stoppers at the ends, since the design was just a cylinder... so heavy coats and bags could slide right off. We managed to make do by rotating the standing mirror around, as there were metal bars on the back that could be popped out and used in lieu of hooks.

We loved the option of free breakfast -- it seems like earlier in the morning, they have croissants (pretty good, with a nice crunch to them), and then they swap in for bagels later. They also provide filtered water and cups in the breakfast area.

Overall, a lovely experience! Next time, I will book the classic or superior room :)

title: Excelente
text:
The hotel is excellent. All renewed. Location perfect close Grand Central Station and the Theater area.
The front desk people are super courteous and helpful .
You fell at home. I will certainly came back and try other Pesana in other cities especially in Portugal

title: Stylish Boutique hotel .. a hidden gem in NYC!
text: We stayed here Christmas week. It was like walking into  Dr Who's Tardis. Very impressive interior and nicely decorated for Christmas. Stockings were hung by the fire. Greeted with a smile by staff; so friendly  and helpful you really felt like you were not just a number.  Our room was just like the photos. Loved the modern vibe of the room from the modern shower to the imitation wood flooring. The bed was so comfortable. It was ideally located for where we wanted to be.  A very cute stylish boutique hotel.. a hidden gem in the City..I would definitely stay here again.

title: highly recommend, best hotel i’ve been to
text:
I came to this hotel with my bestfriend. we are two teenage girls from england so it is scary to come by ourselves but the hotel staff were very friendly and made us feel very comfortable. always greeted with a smile and a “hello” or “how are you guys?”. (i wanted to specifically mention barry for being a legend). there was also a problem we had with our room as it said streetview when we booked it and our view was a brick wall, we mentioned it at the front desk & even though it was because of the website we booked it through (not the hotels fault) they still were more than happy to swap our rooms. the location is very good, walking distance to timesquare & bryant park & lots of gift shops. my friend and i walked to central park aswell which was a little further but there’s a bus stop near by (M3 bus i think it was) takes you right by it, if you are going over new years like we did, i recommend going to central park to watch the fireworks instead of timesquare where it’s overcrowded and not worth it for the ball drop. the bed was very comfy, nice big shower & easy to work. the only problem we had was the $100 you have to pay (you get it back) that we didn’t know before arriving.
you have to pay $100 & you receive it back after your stay, we were on a budget so they let us have a day to give it. there’s also tourist tax which every hotel has but we knew about that. in conclusion i recommend this hotel as much as possible. you aren’t getting any cheaper for what they have to offer & with the location it’s in. i’ve travelled to 5 other countries in the same year and i’m glad we finished it here.

title: Keener was fantastic!
text:
Perfect hotel for a sightseeing trip to NYC, excellent location within walking distance of Grand Central Station, Times Square, Rockefeller Plaza, Central Park and 5th Avenue. 

Keener was amazing and catered to our every need! On our final night of our trip, we had an issue with our AC. Keener immediately upgraded our room to a larger room with a balcony at no additional charge! 

Would definitely recommend and stay here again.

title: Fantastic stat
text: Fantastic room very clean and well looked after we were also lucky to receive an upgrade and the most warm welcome from our host Keener very helpful throughout our stay great location for tourists coming to NYC

title: Emplacement parfait hôtel calme très bien insonorisé.
text:
Séjour parfait, personnel à l’écoute, emplacement idéal, bonne qualité prix pour New York vu l’emplacement à recommandé est bien sûr si l’occasion se représente j’irai au même endroit.
Possibilité de laisser ses bagages, selon le retour, si vous le désirez un transport pour le retour via l’aéroport il s’en occupe en fin de séjour c’est pas négligeable.

title: Amazing stay and wonderful staff!
text:
The hotel is very nice and clean. The rooms are comfortable and good size. Location is very convenient, walking distance to a lot of attractions and close to public transportation. Coffee and tea all day in the lobby plus the pastries, bagels and croissants for breakfast are a great option if you don’t need a big breakfast. 
The staff is amazing! Very welcoming and helpful! Thank you for making our stay unforgettable! 
It’s definitely a great place to stay while visiting New York.

title: I ENJOYED STAYING IN PESTANA AND I RECOMMEND EVERYONE TO TRY THIS PLACE.
text:
THE ROOM IS CLEAN AND BIG, THE BED IS VERY COMFORTABLE, AND RECEPTION STAFF ARE RESPECTFULL.
I WOULD LIKE TO THANK CAMILA FOR THE QUICK CHECK-OUT SHE WAS NICE AND PROFESSIONAL.
THE ONLY PEOBLEM THAT BOTHERED ME THERE WAS NO GYM IN THE HOTEL BUT THEY GIVE AN ACCESS TO GET INTO THE GYM THAT 5 MINS AWAY WALKING FROM THE HOTEL BUT UNFORTUNATELY WAS CHRISTMAS IN MY STAYING TIME AND THE GYM WAS CLOSED.

title: Brilliant!
text: Very welcoming hotel. Comfortable, clean, modern room with great decor. Very friendly staff who were helpful and knowledgeable. The tea, coffee, bagels and croissants were a nice touch. So much to see and do within walking distance. Would definitely recommend.

title: Super friendly staff, GREAT SHOWER!!!!!
text:
I made a mistake and showed up at the wrong Pestana.  I showed up at Park Avenue but my reservation was Pestana NCR 37 by Times Square (NOTE:  Both are on 39th) . However, Lily could not have been more accommodating. She worked some of her keyboard magic so that I could stay at Park Avenue.

Very boutique European feel,  the hotel was great.    The bed was fantastic – firm, but yet supportive.  , Room was small so not a ton of space to hang out, but that did not matter.   The showerhead was phenomenal (NK Porcelanosa) - one of the best hotel showers I have ever had. 

Hotel is very clean  and the folks there are extremely courteous and I would highly recommend.

title: Ruan!
text: Ruan was THE BEST!!!!! He was so accommodating and so helpful. He went above and beyond for us! The space was small but Ruan was so nice that we decided to stay there. Definitely will be back just because of him!

title: Beautiful place, great find.
text:
Really great hotel. It’s surrounded by amazing restaurant. House of Lasagne was gorgeous place and food. It is about 15 mins walk to Times Square. Location is fabulous. Close to most attractions and with there being subways on most blocks it’s a fab base for sight seeing. It’s about 4 mins walk from grand central which is a stunning place. 
We had a room on 28th floor with a balcony at the front of the hotel. The view was absolutely stunning. Gorgeous to watch the sunrise and sunset. The room was clean, small but to be expected with New York hotels. They have made the very best of the space however. The room was not serviced over the weekend which was not ideal but I asked for some clean towels and they were sent straight up to our room. The balcony was a lovely feature but the rail I felt was quite low which made me feel nervous going out there as it is a very small area but view from it was stunning. I would recommend this hotel to anyone and would return. We stopped for 6 nights. The complimentary pastries were a nice touch and there were always plenty each morning. Staff were always friendly and helpful. Big thumbs up from us.

title: Wunderbare Aussicht und sehr aufmerksame Mitarbeiter!
text:
Zentral in der Nähe der Grand Central Station gelegen, viele Sehenswürdigkeiten innerhalb von weniger als 15 Minuten fußläufig erreichbar.
Balkonzimmer bieten eine tolle Aussicht auf die Stadt und das Empire State Building. Zimmer sind sehr sauber und modern eingerichtet mit ausreichend Stauraum für einen Kurzurlaub.
Den gesamten Tag über Kaffee, Tee und Wasser kostenfrei verfügbar, morgens zusätzlich Bagels und Croissants.
Mitarbeiter außerordentlich freundlich und hilfsbereit.
Für einen Städtetrip uneingeschränkt zu empfehlen!

title: Fantastic hotel
text:
What a fantastic hotel this is! It's in a great location just by Grand Central with lovely restaurants near by. We stayed in on the 15th floor with a view of the empire state building. 

The room itself was a good size, just make sure to use all the space and cupboards available. The bed and pillows were great and comfortable. The bathroom was spacious and to a good standard. 

They don't serve breakfast at the hotel but do offer croissants and bagels. We found it best to get there between 7-8 for a good choice as any later then sadly they were all gone. 

The staff at the hotel were amazing, especially Gregory. The hotel are able to accept deliveries which is fantastic as there was a few things I wanted to order. They even took the parcel up to our room for us.

Our flight home was really early in the morning and they sorted out a private hire taxi to take us to the airport at 4am. This was amazing as we didn't have to worry about trying to hail a taxi.

title: Location, staff, decoration and amenities all 5* in our opinion
text: Lovely lovely lovely! Hotel staff were all very friendly, location was perfect. Walking distance from Bryant square and Times Square. Grand central 2 minutes away, lots of typical American food around. Los Tacos a stones throw away which is a must visit. Room was beautifully decorated and very clean, heating and air con all worked perfectly and weren’t too loud. Not loads of space in the room so don’t pack load of big bits, but very cleaver storage and bits. Grab and go area by the lobby was amazing in the morning for a coffee and bagel which was included in the room charge, and just down the street was a place called fresh and co which does really good fresh fruit smoothies without breaking the bank. We’re unlikely to go back to New York as we saw everything we wanted to, but if we did then we would definitely stay here again!

title: Excelente vista! Excelente ubicación!
text:
Nos encantó la ubicación del hotel. Podíamos llegar a todas partes caminando. La vista que teníamos desde la habitación era estupenda. Además Magdalena y Camila fueron demasiado amables, nos hicieron sentir como en casa. Tuvimos una muy buena experiencia. 
Amé el café y los bagels todas las mañanas 🫶

title: New York New York!! & The Pestana! Wonderful.
text:
What a find! 
You will be impressed by the hotel and more importantly the staff. Nothing’s too much trouble and their knowledge of New York, eateries, what to see and do, in fact anything. 

The rooms may be on the smaller side, like most New York hotel rooms, but they are impeccably clean, warm (or with sir-con in summer) and what a fantastic shower!! 
No breakfast as such but a grab and go facility of croissants and bagels and limitless tea/coffee. 

Thoroughly recommend The Pestana if you are visiting New York - its position, so close to Fifth Avenue and Grand Central Terminal for trains couldn’t be better. 
Thank you for making our first trip to New York so memorable.

title: Limpeza e ótimo atendimento
text: Adoramos esse hotel, estivemos lá ano passado e optamos por retornar agora em novembro, a localização permite o deslocamento sem dificuldades. Os colaboradores são prestativos e muito atenciosos em especial o Ruan, sempre bastante solicito.

title: Merci Gregory, Alia & Madalina
text:
We had a wonderful stay in Pestana Park Avenue, we stayed 5 nights on the 26th floor and we had a room with a balcony.
We’ve been welcomed by Madalina, a french-speaker receptionnist, we felt very good after a long flight, she gave us a lot of good tips for our stay.
On the day we were leaving, my fiancée lost her ring and Gregory and Alia gave us the HUGE opportunity to go back to the room and we found back her ring ! Thank you very much to the three of you, you saved the day ! The room was cleaned everyday, beautiful view on the city, we appreciated the grab-and-go system ! If we had to come back in Manhattan, we will sure stay there !
Merci beaucoup from France !

title: Great location for exploring New York, highly recommended City.
text:
The Pestana is a great choice for a hotel situated in Midtown. Our room was an upgrade to a balcony room with a view of The Empire State Building because we were on our honeymoon. Thank you Pestana.
The only issue we had with our room was where to put everything. The room is compact which was fine but there were only 4 knobs which we found stuff slipped off. Maybe change them to more of a hook and put a few more up around the room?
They provide toiletries, coffee machine, fresh water daily and there are usb sockets by the bed.
Every morning there were croissants and bagels available which is a lovely touch.
All staff we came across were helpful and friendly.
We would definitely stay here again next time we visit NYC.

title: I‘m in love with this Hotel
text: Best place ever for New York! Very clean, cute rooms, best view! the staff and the manager very friendly. We felt very comfortable. 10/10! We will definitely come back to this hotel. For New York ist The best place!

title: Solid Midtown hotel.
text: The hotel was very convenient to all of Midtown.  The rooms are quite small (my bag had to open on the floor), and there is no storage other than a small drawer under the bed, but the staff are lovely and it’s a good place if you get a good deal.  No frills. There is access to a gym a few blocks away (no towels — bring your own from the hotel!), and breakfast is really just a few bagels left out for customers to prepare themselves, if you get there early enough.  So, no real food options in the hotel, but plenty nearby.

title: Our First Time at the Pestana Park Avenue
text:
My husband and I arrived at the Pestana Park Avenue earlier than the normal check in time of 3pm and they were able to check us in.

We were happy that the Hotel Manager Victor was able to provide us with an upgrade to a City View Room. We were very appreciative that we received this room. Omg the view is magnificent. We had a spectacular view of the Empire State Building. It helped make our stay a lot more enjoyable.

There were 2 shower types, one overhead which had very high water pressure, and one that you can hold with your hand.

We did not hear any noise from the other rooms. This is very important to us.

They provided croissants and bagels on a first come, first served basis in the sitting area near the coffee machine and water fountain area.

Pestana Park Avenue is in close proximity to Grand Central Terminal and Bryant Park - Sixth Avenue subway stations. We also enjoyed a walk uptown towards Rockefeller Center. 

We thoroughly enjoyed our week’s stay at Pestana Park Avenue. We would recommend staying for any new traveler to New York.

title: Nice stay, for our first time
text: A nossa estadia foi ótima, o quarto é bem limpo e tem serviço de quarto todo dia, apesar de ser um pouco pequeno, vale a pena por estar próximo a tudo em NY. There’s water refill inside, which is good

title: Muy recomendado!!
text: La ubicación es excelente. Muy céntrico y fácil de caminar a bryant park, Rockefeller, Empire State y la 5a Av. Además, está a lado de Grand Central, lo que hacía muy fácil movernos por metro(tiene varias conexiones) y hasta en tren al aeropuerto. El hotel y los cuartos no son muy grandes pero están muy bien, modernos, limpios y nos hicieron un upgrade a una habitación con balcón y vista al Empire State. El staff también muuuuy amable. Súper recomendable!

title: Muy bien
text: Muy buena situación, camas muy cómodas, buena atención,  pequeño aperitivo incluido para desayunar muy a tener en cuenta. Puedes ir andando a cualquier sitio, personal habla español, muy cerca de la biblioteca pública que merece la pena visitar

title: Hôtel parfait
text: Hôtel idéalement situé, personnel très accueillant et soucieux du bien être des clients. Chambre calme avec une literie reposante. Nous sommes ravis d’être descendu dans cet hôtel et reviendrons dans celui-ci avec plaisir

title: November visit
text: I’ve been at Pestana hotel in last week of November and it was amazing time in NY. My room was generously upgraded by Manager Lilly from cozy to city view. The rooms are small but well-configured, the bed was very comfortable. downstairs is available kitchen with few tables and microwave, coffee, tea, also every morning the beagles were provided. The hotel is very good located, few minutes walk to main streets. I fully recommend this hotel, the crew was very kind and helpful

title: Great hotel to explore new York
text: Excellent location,spotless rooms , excellent staff , if your looking for a great base to explore this is the one for you . If your looking for a hotel with a bar . Restaurants them go somewhere else . I came for a week from the UK to explore new York and don't think I could have chosen better .  Thanks to all the staff

title: Great stay
text: I had a great stay! Clean room and bathroom. What really sets Pestana apart is its attention to detail and customer service. Ruan from the front desk made our stay delightful. He went above and beyond suggesting excellent places to eat, subways to use, and just made us feel at home. He was very warm and it was nice chatting with him always smiling! Highly recommend a stay here. Location was perfect as it was central for everything we wanted to see.

title: Amazing New York
text: Wonderful experience staying at the Pestana Park Avenue hotel, NY, the comfort, the style, the location, it is like being at home, the treatment has been truly excellent from all the staff, especially the warm welcome and cordiality at all times from Ruan at reception, I have great memories, thank you very much for everything.

title: Pestana was AMAZING
text: My wife and I stayed here for our Honeymoon and man was it worth it! Pestana was absolutely stunning. From the service, to the room, to the view and it all. 5 stars all around. The welcomed us with a complementary bottle of wine for the occasion as well! Vince at the desk was awesome! Every place he suggested to eat was some of the best food I've ever had. Thank you all so much for such an unforgettable stay!

title: Great Boutique Hotel in NYC
text: My stay at the Pestana Park Avenue was a pleasant one. I enjoyed the room and how great the staff was in answering all my questions. They provide you with a voucher for a gym to go to down the street. I will definitely be staying here again.

title: Ótimo hotel com localização perfeita
text:
Tive uma ótima experiência em nossa passagem pelo Pestana Park Avenue, as pessoas que trabalham no hotel são incrivelmente educadas e receptivas, sempre dispostas a ajudar. O hotel não conta com café da manhã mas todos os dias cedo dá aos hóspedes que desejarem croissants, bagels e café, que ficam disponíveis na cozinha/refeitório do hotel.
A localização do hotel é inigualável, fica a apenas 2 quadras da Grand Central Terminal e pouco mais de uma quadra da 5th Avenue, perfeito para quem deseja explorar a cidade.
E o quarto esteve sempre muito limpo e organizado, com uma cama e travesseiros extremamente macios, banho quente e com uma ótima pressão no chuveiro, e a temperatura do quarto sempre ideal.
Foi uma experiência incrível conhecer NYC estando hospedados no Pestana Park Avenue, e com certeza iremos voltar!

title: Beautiful Boutique Hotel
text:
First, I made a mistake on my booking dates and I did not realize this until after my free of penalty change period. I am thankful the Pestana Manager allowed the change. Yes, I had to pay more now for a superior room but I was happy the manager allowed me to change the dates. I don’t know what I would have done if they still charged me for the incorrect dates. Thank you for making this mistake less stressful. 

The staff are incredible, I did not get all names but Pestana Park Ave, give kudos to all of them! A very clean and friendly hotel. 

The room included everything you need. Bed was comfortable and as mentioned by another guest, I loved the non carpet room. 

I don’t know if room 303 was “superior” for the view but nevertheless we were hardly there  anyways to worry about it. 

Recommend to check out JohnDoe  pub for happy hour if you want to save some bucks and enjoy great food.

title: Never again
text:
I’ve stayed in nyc many times and this has to be the smallest room I’ve ever stayed in. Literally no room to move and nowhere to put your suitcase. The sink is in the room too which is very awkward. 

I feel I got catfished with this place :( I’d say only stay here if you’re just in town for a night and bringing nothing with you. 

The tiny room wasn’t helped by our room not being cleaned for two out of our four day stay:( 

Other issues include a lot of dust in the room. Also the tv wasn’t working and neither was the overhead shower… this was sorted but should be checked before guests checkin.

title: Great wee hotel in the center of everything!
text: We stayed at the pestana Park for a week in October. The room was modern and clean with all the emineties needed. The staff were very friendly and professional. We were attending a wedding in New city New York and the front of house staff were very helpful and arranged a car to take us there and back. I would highly recommend this hotel and would gladly stay again.

title: Amazing hotel in an excellent location
text:
Amazing hotel, in an excellent location. We were lucky enough to have a breathtaking view over the Empire State and New York. The staff was very friendly! A special thank you to Camilla, Juan, Victor and Madalena for making our stay so comfortable and enjoyable.
Thank you again!

title: Comfortable and Practical
text: The beds were super comfortable, location was amazing (central but farelly calm noise wise), and the staff very friendly and helpful (thank you again Victor, Camilla, and the young portuguese intern!). Coffee, tea and many other complementary amenities available made our stay extra comfortable. Incredible view of the city and the Empire State Building. Would definetly recommend!

title: Amazing stay at the Pestana in NY. Excellent location and friendly staff
text: Excellent location with the friendliest and most helpful staff we could have asked for. The hotel room was extremely comfortable with a very nice view to the Empire State Building. We would like to thank Camilla, Victor and Juan for their warm welcome, and helping us with restaurant reservations, recommendations, taxi bookings and their general good mood.

title: Amazing water pressure = happy me
text: First off, best water pressure I’ve ever experienced at a hotel!!! The staff is extremely helpful and pleasant, plus every time I entered my hotel room it was pristine. Overall it was a great stay and I’d definitely want to stay there again.

title: 100% recommend!
text:
First thing first, Greg is the best. 

We arrived in NYC red eye at 6 for a conference during the Marathon weekend and the check-in has been one of the smoothest experience! 

Room was comfy and clean

title: What a cosy and pleasant hotel.
text: Perfect hotel for a New York experience, located in midtown close to all hot spots in that area. The views dorm the higher floors are just amazing, the amenities are just the essencial needed and in the right place and order. Small details that make a difference and making you think as a nice hotel to come back in next visit to the city.

title: Perfect boutique hotel!
text: Perfect boutique hotel with amazing and welcoming staff, great atmosphere and fantastic location! Special highlight to Ruan on the front desk - super friendly and courteous - it was a pleasure talking to him !

title: NYC vacation
text: Very friendly staff and perfect stay in the centre of New York City. Central station is very close by and everything is very easily accessible. Rooms are clean and tidy and the view was very nice! Enjoyed the stay :)

title: Great stay
text: We had a great time in the hotel. Staff is great, bed very confortable and shower is amazing. They have complementary bagels and croisants in the morning. Highly recommended if you need a place to stay in New York.

title: Molto buono
text: Molto gentili in reception camere piccole ma cercano di sfruttare al massimo gli spazi. Ottima la doccia molto spaziosa e con porta in cristallo. Unici problemi sono la mancanza di armadi e il lavabo che è stato posizionato fuori dal bagno. Ottimo è il servizio della colazione mattutina che non era prevista nel pacchetto. Ottima posizione centrale.

title: Great concierge. Comfy pillows.
text: Great hotel for our reunion in town. The location is near Grand Central, restaurants, bars, & subway stop.  The room has everything you need. Love the pillows!! Coffee 24/7 in the back. Lovely outdoor patio. The front desk people are wonderful and always helpful.   One stand out is Keener, Supervisor.  He was consistently helpful and creative to our group throughout our stay.

title: Lovely 9-day stay
text: The hotel is clean, beautiful and quaint. Ruan, our concierge was incredibly helpful and accommodating! Would definitely recommend as the area is quiet and not as busy compared to times square, but close enough to the main areas and transport hubs.

title: Agréable séjour à Pestana park
text:
Pestana Park avenue est une très belle surprise. 
Nous avons étaient chaleureusement accueillis par Ruan et Magdalena avec leur grand sourire ! (Petit plus utile, Magdalena parle français )
Ils sont dispo et à l’écoute chaque jours pour vous satisfaire.  
La chambre était confortable, fonctionnelle avec une déco soignée, avec en prime la vue sur l’empire State building !
Il y a également un service de grab and go le matin avec croissants, bagels et boissons chaudes, eau toute la journée, de quoi prendre des forces avant d’arpenter les rues de New York ! 
Pestana est une belle découverte et il est certain que nous reviendrons prochainement !

title: Conhecer Nova York com minha esposa
text: O hotel é muito bom super recomendo, as acomodações são ótimas e é tudo novo no hotel ,confortáveis, um destaque para o atendente Ruan um Brasileiro extremamente educado e simpático, nos ajudou com muitas dicas transmitindo segurança na estadia. Nos sentimos em casa, seguros, uma vez que não falamos inglês nos trouxe muita paz em estar aqui. O hotel não possui café da manhã porém dispõe de uma máquina de café cortesia e croassant e beagle, fez a diferença em algumas manhãs de passeios agendados. Assim que possível retornaremos agora com os filhos.

title: Wonderful Hotel Experience!
text: This has been the best hotel experience I've experienced in NYC I've tried so hard finding one that accommodates my needs and happy I've found this place. The hotel is in a great location plenty of amazing restaurants around I couldn't believe how quiet the location was very peaceful! The rooms were spotless I loved how clean everything was. The staff was very attentive as soon as I walked in the door Camila greeted and she was very helpful with my check in and any questions I had regarding my stay. All the other staff did an amazing job as well.

title: The perfect New York Hotel
text:
We had an excellent 5 night stay at the Pestana Park Hotel. All of the concierge staff were friendly and helpful. The room was of a high standard and the added bonus of the grab and go breakfast in the morning was a welcome addition as was the coffee machine! The bed and pillows were extremely comfortable - had a great sleep.
Would thoroughly recommend this hotel for closeness to all the sights and in a nice quiet location. It really cannot be faulted.

title: Clean, modern, great
text: Loved this hotel! Clean, comfortable, bright and updated decor. Appreciated the complimentary espresso, both in the room and in the small breakfast nook. I would absolutely return to Pestana if I come to the area again.

title: Fantastic customer service
text:
We had a lovely stay. The reception staff was fantastic. Always made us feel welcome and always friendly. Thank you again for the upgrade and birthday surprise.
The room was small (no surprise for NYC), but the space was used so well. It was comfortable for the six nights we stayed. Highly recommend!

title: Amazing
text: This place was so amazing!  Can't say enough,  so I booked it again for Thanksgiving week. Everyone was great! Can't wait to visit again.  If you are looking for a 5 star place to stay, this is the place to be.

title: Wonderful hotel and a great location!
text: The Pestana Park Avenue Hotel was wonderful. The staff were very friendly and helpful. Our room was clean, modern, and very comfortable. We felt right at home. It was also nice that there was a little breakfast room on the main floor where we could grab a quick bagel or croissant in the morning before heading out to sightsee. The location was also great, walkable to so many things. We would definitely stay there again.

title: 8 night stay
text:
We stayed at Pestana for 8 nights in Sept / October 2023. 
The hotel is very clean, rooms are serviced daily and it is convenient to Grand Central / Bryant Park / NY Public Library. 
The rooms are clean and well presented, and the beds are big and comfortable. 
The rooms are very small (smaller than we’ve experienced in NY on other visits).  We had 2 suitcases and had to store one under the bed and one on the small sitting area - there was nowhere else. The bathroom is extremely small as well. 
Each guest receives one bottle of water (complimentary) for the stay. As we were there for 8 nights we asked if it would be possible to have another - the answer was no, but the disappointing thing was the manner in which our request was met. Other questions at the desk were answered politely.

title: Great botique hotel in midtown
text: Perfect location in midtown  with grand central nearby. Room has almost no noice from the city and cleaning was great. friendly and professional staff. And we liked the small breakfast that was included. Would definitely come back and we recommends this hotel. 😀

title: Great stay. Thank you management to make our stay memorable
text: We had a great time at Pestana Park Avenue. Great atmosphere, location is perfect and a quiet area. Front desk very friendly, Ruan was a good concierge with tips from NYC. Definitely will recommend to family and friends stay there  if they go to New York.

title: Elegant room, excellent service.
text:
My room and its amenities were very comfortable and very well kept. The view is great.

Keener at the front desk was very professional and friendly.
His service would make me want to return at the Pestana for my next visit to New York.

title: Great find
text: Great location. Very friendly and helpful staff. Rooms decent size (for New York). Very clean and modern. Great showers. Comfortable bed. My room view was disappointing but I didn’t book the room for the view. Would definitely stay and again and recommend for others.

title: Great hotel with welcoming staff
text: This hotel met all my needs and more. I was here for a work trip and arrived at 3am to check in with no problems. They provided me with a warm welcome and continue to provide excellent support throughout my stay. The rooms are clean and cute, and the views are even better! Added surprise perk was the balcony on my room!

title: Really great place!
text: The bed is so comfortable. Most hotels are very firm but this one is the perfect blend of soft and supportive. The views are great, the space is beautiful, and it was the perfect location to all the places I needed (and wanted) to go!

title: Boutique Hotel for the win!
text:
This boutique hotel is located in a great area with walking distances to everything we needed. The staff is unbelievably friendly and helpful. It was just a wonderful experience! 
The rooms are New York City size and beautifully appointed. I even loved the clothes steamer they had in the room.  We will definitely stay there again.

title: Very good option to stay in NYC
text: The hotel is at a great location, it's very clean, all the people working there is very kind, and the coffee and bagels offer for free really makes you feel like if you were at home. No doubt I recommend the Pestana Park Avenue to stay in Manhattan.

title: Estadia especial!
text: Ótimo atendimento, limpeza sempre bem feita, organização do espaço e quartos, localização privilegiada em Nova Iorque, funcionários sempre atenciosos e muito gentis! Todos os dias fomos bem atendidos, não tem café incluso, mas sempre tem algo para comer na copa.

title: You won't be disappointed
text: We loved it here! Victor on reception was very friendly,  handsome too! Look me up if youre ever in North England! Maids cleaned every day. Fresh towels daily. Good views. Loved the croissants and bagels! Couldn't work the TV. But didn't need it anyway! Great location.  Quiet yet central. Felt safe. Room has minibar, safe, iron, hairdryer. Would come again. Only downside is no bar or restaurant but that didn't bother me as I ordered in ubereats. Exceptionally clean. Smells amazing. Come here, you won't be disappointed! And that's a lot as I am very fussy! Sending the staff all my best wishes from the UK!

title: Amazing hotel
text: This boutique hotel is the perfect place to stay if you wanna be in a quiet and nice place close to everything literally in midtown. Staff really friendly. Ruan at the front desk is a cool guy. Definitely will stay again.

title: Super Recomendado
text: Localização privilegiada, a passos de vários pontos turísticos,  transporte, restaurantes, parque, feira. Instalações muito novas, quartos amplos, com armário,  máquina de café,  gavetões sob a cama. Pessoal extremamente atencioso. Especial agradecimento ao Ruan, funcionário da portaria, brasileiro,  que foi de uma amabilidade especialíssima para comigo e minha família. Embora a diária conste como sendo sem café da manhã, há na verdade um café servido como cortesia todas as manhãs: vários tipos de café,  leite,  bagels, croissant, geleias, etc.

title: All around good hotel.
text: Very helpful staff,  easy location for Grand Central, subways, cabs always there, car service to airports.  Rooms a bit small but well appointed. Tables in lobby and breakfast area for working, if wanted.  Free croissants, bagels, coffee tea. I enjoyed top floor (28th) with balcony and city views to die.

title: Pleasant stay
text:
We had an excellent stay. Room is functional, with some smart solutions.  Fantastic housekeeping. 

Generally the staff is friendly and gives good support, we felt very welcome.

Location is perfect if you want to move around both i  mid Manhattan or further (2 big subway stops close by)

Slight minus is that the breakfast is very simple and on a first come, first serve basis. If you are not downstairs before 930 latest, you are most likely out of luck....

title: Fantastic Hotel and Fantastic Location
text:
I'm writing this review on my last night here at Pestana Park Avenue. I travel a lot and I was blown away by the authentic smiles and greetings by staff and Luljeta, the manager, was just next level. I can't even find words to describe her. She genuinely cares and makes you feel like a person nor just an everyday customer.  She just gives you this amazing person attention that makes you feel like you are at home.  I traveled solo and I felt safe during my stay. The views with from the balcony rooms are breathtaking. I went to sleep with the Empire State building view just outside my window. 
I'm just blown away by everything. The location, the views, the cleanliness, the staff and the cherry on top was the amazing experience I had with Luljeta.   I'll be back soon and without hesitation, I can say that  Pestana Park Avenue is my new home away from home, and this is where I'll be staying.  xoxo Anna

title: Perfect honeymoon
text:
We stayed at the Pestana for four nights for our honeymoon. We were greeted amazingly by a member of the team (I did not get his name) but he was incredibly helpful we had arrived late due to flight and he suggested some places to grab some food. At the mention of it being our honeymoon and first time in New York we were given an upgrade to a room with a balcony which was just incredible! 
The room was clean, comfortable and the air con was a god send. The views were incredible. The hotel was the perfect base for us and all the staff were encountered were warm, welcome and very helpful. The complimentary bagels and crossiants available in the morning were also great. We had a holiday of a lifetime and we will never forget the Pestana as our honeymoon hotel. Thank you so much 😊

title: Great holidays in Manhattan!
text:
The best location close to all main buildings. Well attended by all staff.
Nice room, very comfortable bed. Big windows but unfortunately our room didn’t have views of the city. Good breakfast by free to start the day.

title: Absolutely lovely
text: The Pestana was lovely!  Perfect location with a staff that went out of their way to be helpful.  The room was very clean and had everything we needed.  I was surprised how quiet it was, too.  We will definitely stay there again.

title: Girls trip
text: I love this hotel!! The bed is very comfy and staff is polite. Would love to stay here again! The coffee is very good and such a nice machine to use. They can hold your luggage before or after check in/check out which is very nice.

title: Recommande ce jolie petit hôtel
text:
Hôtel super bien situé tout près de Manhattan et du Bryan Park 
L’hôtel est très propre et confortable , sa sent très bon et la chambre est très jolie. 
Le personnel très sympa 
Je reviendrai !!!! 
Merci

title: Ótimas férias com Pestana Park Avenue
text:
O hotel é muito bem localizado, silencioso, e tem tudo para deixar a viagem a NK mais tranquila.  Perto de vários pontos turísticos de Midtowm. As acomodações são modernas e a limpeza é nota dez. Oferecem um lanche na parte da manhã que ajuda a i iniciar o dia com mais energia.
O staf é muito simpático, em especial o Ruan que é muito simpático, competente e está sempre disposto a ajudar os hóspedes  com suas dúvidas além de mostrar de forma clara que gosta do que faz.
Nosso abraço para a Marlene que é muito carinhosa e atenciosa.
Rafael e Marília - Brasil

title: Perfect for Exploring
text:
Great hotel, great location, lovely staff. Small rooms but well designed and thought out to provide great storage. No dining facilities on site but morning grab and go coffee and pastries were great. 

Location is convenient for all midtown attractions and close to Grand Central for subway transport to lower Manhattan,  Queens, The Bronx and Brooklyn.

title: Buena ubicación
text:
Hotel tranquilo super céntrico,  útil si vienes del aeropuerto en tren, muy cerca de Grand Central. La habitación doble con vistas es pequeña pero muy cómoda y con todo lo necesario, la cama muy cómoda. Desayuno de cortesía. En mi opinión que soy sensible al ruido, el aire acondicionado hace demasiado ruido (no se escucha el de la calle). También creo que deberían entregar la factura cuando pagas, pese a pedirla no me la dieron.
El personal fue amable en general, uno de los recepcionistas habla español.
Repetiríamos.

title: Amazing all around trip!
text: Great stay! Nice boutique hotel with good amenities and great service! Ask for Victor and Gregory; they were the best! Very convenient location near Grand Central Station, New York public library and Chrysler building.

title: Perfeito pra NY
text:
Excelente localização
Equipe muito atenciosa
Quartos ótimos novos e limpos
Banho excelente
Hotel com 2 anos de construção
Local para hóspede preparar seu café com leite, torradeira, micro, gelo, chá e donuts

title: Great Hotel in Midtown Manhattan
text: This is our second visit to the Pestana this year.  We love this hotel. The rooms are new and modern. The hotel is well managed and very clean. Staff are very helpful and friendly. Keener, the supervisor was exceptional, professional and accommodating. We come to New York frequently and will certainly continue to stay here going forward.

title: Wonderful location to visit New York city
text: Everything is perfect, above all position and coffee machine! Rooms are confortable and clean. Staff is very kind and friendly. I love everything. Near to Grand central et subway, you can go everywhere easily.

title: amazing
text: keener at the front desk is a phenomenal host. he needs to be paid more money bc he is the reason i’m back here staying at this hotel for my second time. god bless keener . keener if ur reading this thank you for making my stay at pestana park a delight.

title: Excellent.
text: Excellent stay. Great service. Clean. Solid amenities. No gym, but they have a partnership with a fine gym just around the corner. The room was pleasant and quiet. Sheets were clean. Overall couldn’t ask for more for a simple hotel to stay in.

title: Magnifico hotel en Manhattan
text:
Hotel 10 en Manhattan. Cerca de la estacion central, el Summit. Barrio tranquilo con afluencia de bus y metro en la zona. 
Muy limpio. Estuvimos 8 noches y genial.
La habitación amplia, con una cama enorme SUPER COMODA, con una ducha con presion MAGNIFICA. No tiene armarios pero si dos grandes cajones debajo de la cama, tiene un sofa y una mesa auxiliar. Tambien tiene jabon, champu con dosificador, una pequeña nevera y una plancha de ropa.
El hotel dispone de maquina de cafe y de agua GRATIS. Tambien tiene por la mañana croasant de cortesia, leche etc. Dispone de mesas y sillas para poder comer ( puedes comprar por la zona la cena y cenas alli).
El personal muy amable, el recepcionista moreno con barba muy simpatico.
Si volviese a NY no dudaria en volver a este hotel. Un 10.

title: Et fantastisk hotell med perfekt beliggenhet!
text:
Et fantastisk hotell med perfekt beliggenhet. Ble veldig godt mottatt når vi ankom hotellet av Gregory (tror jeg han het) i resepsjonen. Da vi fortalte at vi kom fra Norge, og var i New York for å feire 25- års bryllupsdag, oppgraderte han hotellrommet vårt til et med en fantastisk utsikt over NY. Alt var rent og ryddig, veldig hjelpsomme og hyggelige ansatte. Kunne spise frokost hver morgen nede ved resepsjonen, det ble lagt ut rundstykker, som man selv kunne smøre på med syltetøy. Kaffemaskin og drikke var også tilgjengelig der nede. 5 min til Grand Sentral, hvor man kunne finne subway og busser. 10 min å gå til Times Square. En hyggelig park, Bryant Park lå 5 min fra hotellet. Vi bodde 1 uke på hotellet, og det var et perfekt opphold, kommer vi noen gang tilbake til New York, så kommer vi til å bo på Pestana Park Avenue.
Tusen takk for oss!

Vennlig hilsen Wenche og Tommy :)

title: Piacevole soggiorno a Manhattan
text:
Hotel in ottima posizione fra la Madison e Park av a circa 15 minuti a piedi da Times Square. Ci ha dato la possibilità di visitare anche luoghi senza utilizzare i mezzi pubblici che comunque sono abbondanti in ogni direzione.
Molto apprezzato lo spazio relax, con possibilità di farsi te, caffè, cappuccino a qualunque ora ed un servizio mattutino di croissant e baghel con cui fare una colazione senza svenarsi nei locali qui attorno.
La nostra stanza dava sulla corte interna quindi era anche molto silenziosa.
Consigliato per un viaggio in coppia.

title: It was nice, the rooms are a bit small. The staff is awesome
text:
Barry is great! He made syre I'm all set and he was very proffetional.
The rooms are a bit small but the staff were doing their best to make sure I'm comfterball and all set.
Very responsive and in general was really good.

title: Great stay!
text: Great hotel.  Very clean, new amenities, and friendly staff.  Rooms are tiny but on par with NYC and well appointed.  Partnership with Blink is a great perk for a NYC hotel. Loved the in room Nespresso machines as well!

title: Ameiiiii
text: Estive em julho a passeio pela primeira vez a NYC. Gostaria de deixar um recado em especial ao RUAN (brasileiro) que foi um diferencial enorme nos meus dias rm NY. Me senti em casa, muito bem atendida e quase roubei ele do trabalho para ir bater perna comigo. title: Great hotel, with a fantastic team in a perfect location
text:
We just wanted to pop our appreciation on here to Lilly and her team for making our stay at the beginning of July a memorable one.

The rooms were not the largest we've had in Manhattan but were spotless from a daily maid service, clean, bright and made use of every inch of spare space with under bed storage and a small hanging space. One word of caution for those staying longer than a couple of nights that are bringing a number of clothes to hang, there really is only minimal hanging space, so pack accordingly.

The bathroom was also compact, but modern and super clean with plenty of clean towels and a special mention for the supremely comfortable bed too and the ice cold air con, which definitely came in handy as the temps went over 90F, while we were there.

A really nice touch and a great benefit if you’re rushing out the door, first thing in the morning is the complimentary breakfast bagels and croissant available in the rear of the ground floor, past Reception. These are accompanied by all the usual associated cream cheese, jelly and butter available in an ice cold fridge, together with an excellent coffee machine, ice machine and microwave, so you can even warm up food you’ve brought back to the hotel.

There’s also ice cold lemon water provided too.

I’ve left the best to last though, which is the incredible friendliness and helpfulness of the team at The Pestana. Led by the lovely Lilly, her team looked after us admirably and Lilly herself was quick to resolve an issue on check-in, even though she was not actually working that day, which immediately showed the team’s commitment to customer satisfaction. 
Special shout out to Victor, Amelia and Juan ( I hope that’s the right spelling!) for being so friendly, funny and helpful and especially to Lilly for all the help she gave us even before check-in, the great conversations, the room upgrade and the lovely gift for my upcoming birthday.

In summary, it’s a great place to come and explore Midtown and beyond from if you’re in the City for a few days, where you’ll definitely get looked after in exemplary fashion by Lilly and her team, who are a supremely fun bunch.

Can’t rate them highly enough and can’t wait to catch up with them, next time we’re back in Manhattan. Cheers guys.

title: Excellent cannot recommend highly enough
text:
We have recently stayed at the Pestana Park avenue between 28th June to 4th July We had 2 classic rooms. 

Rooms 
Rooms were compact with ample under bed storage and a small hanging space. The bathroom again was compact but modern. 
Room’s immaculately clean with maid service daily. Very comfy bed with lovely quality linen and freshly laundered towels

Breakfast 
Complimentary grab and go breakfast if required-Starbucks coffee machine, ice machine and microwave all provided, bagels for toasting and fresh croissants cream cheese and jam & Iced lemon water. 

Staff 
Very friendly, knowledgable front of house staff. 

Location 
Perfect for grand central subway and within walking distance to many of major attractions 

Summary 
Highly recommended boutique hotel. Great ambassadors for the Pestana group. Within the past 6 months we have had the privilege of staying at Shangri La, Mandarin Oriental and Raffles hotels. The Pestana Park Avenue can hold its head high. 
I will actively seek out the brand for our future travels .

title: Very Enjoyable Stay
text:
Stayed here for an overnight with my husband and was pleasantly surprised. It is much nicer and much more modern than the pictures. 
There is also a cute little kitchen in the back with Starbucks you can brew and breakfast in the morning! 
Our room was small but had everything we needed. The bed was very comfy and the shower -hands down -is the BEST hotel shower Ive EVER used. The combo of hot water and water pressure is perfection! 
The steamer is also better than the one we have at home. 
The only downside was the a/c. Even with the fan on low it blasted arctic air. That’s the only reason it’s not 5stars for me. 
Still - my husband and I said we would definitely book again in the future. It’s in a good neighborhood and close to anything and everything.

title: Boa experiência!
text:
A cama é super confortável! Sem contar o chuveiro, que é maravilhoso! Sai bastante água e é muito forte, tudo o que eu precisava depois de um longo dia caminhando por NYC!
A pequena cafeteria no andar de baixo ajuda bastante! Café, agua e chá a vontade, além de pãezinhos. 
O Ruan, brasileiro que fica na recepção, foi super educado. Muito solícito. Eu pedi um quarto com vista (o que não era a minha reserva) e ele prontamente se prontificou a me ajudar! Adorei conhecê-lo.
Pontos nem tanto agradáveis do hotel: 
1. O quarto é extremamente pequeno. Pequeno MESMO! Não dá onde pendurar as roupas tão pouco onde abrir a mala. Para um casal, seria impossível.
2. As portas dos quartos batem bastante no corredor. São muito pesadas.
3. Não há serviço de quarto: então se te der forma a noite e você quiser um sanduíche, tem que pedir no Uber ou sair para pegar. 

Em resumo, os pontos contra não me desagradaram a ponto de eu não ter gostado da estadia. Fiquei contente. Destaque foi certamente o RUAN! muito obrigada.

title: Un hôtel en plein coeur de ville.
text:
Belle découverte pour cet hôtel en plein coeur de New York.  Idéalement situé, à côté de Grand Central, il permet de découvrir de nombreux quartiers à pied.
L'accueil chaleureux, le personnel disponible et la propreté en font un hôtel à recommander sans hésitation. Merci à tout le personnel avec une mention spéciale pour Marleny et son sourire quotidien.

title: Cute Hotel
text: This was a nice hotel to stay in. Close to everything in downtown NYC. All places in walking distance. Reasonable cost. Grab and go breakfast and Starbucks coffee made it even better. Staff are very courteous. Will stay here again in the future

title: Beautiful hotel, modern and super clean! Amazing staff!
text: This was a 10/10 experience! The hotel is modern, well equiped and very clean. There is dining area with complementary bevrages and bagels 24/7 and a beautiful patio where you can have your breakfast. The staff is super kind and helpfull with anything you need! Also, the location is the best! Nearby many atractions but in a quiet block so you can rest. I would defenetely return and recomend!!

title: Perfect hotel and location ⭐️
text:
We loved this hotel, it was immaculate and the staff were all so friendly. Our room even had a view of the Empire State Building! 
The rooms were compact (we knew this beforehand) but the room had everything we needed in and were cleaned everyday. 
The location of this hotel was perfect for us, far enough away from the hustle and bustle of Times Square but close enough to walk everywhere we wanted with ease. We would definitely return to the Pestana Park Ave.

title: Great counter staff Keener service

title: The best hotel I have stayed at in a while!!  Can’t wait to come back!!
text: This was the BEST hotel I have stayed at in so long. The room was so clean I could smell how fresh the towels and bedding and shower was.  The bed was so comfortable it just invited you in. title: Fantastic Stay!!
text: My daughter and I chose this hotel because of the great reviews and we were not disappointed.  The staff were fantastic from the moment we arrived, very friendly and always willing to help. title: Perfect midtown location
text:

The staff was friendly and helpful, all around a great visit.

title: Ottima struttura in posizione strategica
text:
Albergo in posizione estremamente comoda a due passi dalla stazione Grand Central e lo splendido Bryant Park.
Camera non troppo grande (in linea per la cittá) ma dotata di tutti i comfort (letto comodissimo,ampia doccia e macchinetta Nespresso) e soprattutto ben insonorizzata.
Il personale alla reception molto cordiale e disponibile (un ringraziamento in particolare al Sig. Victor per i preziosi consigli).
Molto apprezzata la sala (con tavoli anche all'aperto) provvista di frigo, distributore dell'acqua,forno a microonde e macchinetta dove potersi preparare caffè e bevande accompagnate da bagel messi sempre a disposizione dalla struttura gratuitamente.
Unica cosa che mi sentirei di consigliare è una maggiore illuminazione della stanza.
Prezzi in linea con le tariffe newyorkesi.

title: Perfect NY Hotel
text: This was a gem of a hotel! The location is perfect. Close to Grand Central Terminal, close to Times Square, close to lower Manhattan.  The room was very modern. The hotel intself is new and you can tell that the owners took great care when they put it all together to make sure that the details were just right. The staff was very friendly, professional, and accommodating. This is definitely the place i would stay the next time i’m in NY!

title: Beautiful hotel
text:
I just returned from an excellent stay at Pestana Park Avenue. I will definitely be staying again when I am in New York. 

Everyone who I interacted with at the front desk was kind and helpful. The hotel is small, but elegant. There are four rooms per floor. My room faced the back, but it did not detract from my experience. 

The rooms are spotless and so impeccably designed for function despite their small size. The bed was luxurious with tightly tucked white sheets and comfortable pillows. Spots to charge phone/computer were conveniently located, and wifi worked perfectly. 

The floors in the room are wood and spotless. The bathroom felt brand new. 

Couldn't be happier with my stay!

title: Stay at Pestana

title: pessima esperienza
text: Prenotato questa struttura attraverso il tour operator Gastaldi Viaggi pensavo di trovare un Albergo a 4 stelle come da descrizione. In realtà al nostro arrivo siamo stati alloggiati in una stanza di poco più di 10 metri quadrati, senza armadio (a loro detta l'armadio sono due cassetti posizionati sotto il letto) e con il bagno (doccia e vater) dove muoversi prevedeva essere un contorsionista (se raggiunge i 3 metri quadrati è tanto). Il lavandino era fuori dal bagno a ridosso dell'ingresso e bisognava stare attenti ad aprire le porte poichè si rischiava di prendere un colpo in testa. La gestione delle pulizie un disastro su 5 notti 2 volte la camera non è stata rifatta nonostante le nostre proteste e le salviette non sostituite. Impianto aria condizionata rumorosissimo e di notte il rumore spesso ti svegliava. Complessivamente un vero disastro ... probabilmente le stelle sono 2 ad essere generosi. Pessimo una vera presa per i fondelli.

title: ESPERIENZA MERAVIGLIOSA !!!
text:
Abbiamo prenotato quest’hotel perché ci sembrava il migliore… E LO È! 
In super centro , vicinissimo a gran central station, alla 5th avanue, a 10 minuti dall’affollatissima Time Square, alla libreria , a mezz’ora a piedi dal Central Park … al centro di tutto e perfetto per tutti. 
All’arrivo ci è stato spiegato che la colazione si può trovare nell’aria ristoro, basica e veloce ma caffè, bagels, sn sufficienti per ripartire con calma .. possibile rifornire acqua ogni volta che si desidera (non è così scontato) e visto i prezzi folli di New York è una già tanto. 
Le stanze piccole per noi europee ma ottimizzate al massimo e tutto sommato comode, materassi comodi e non è una cosa scontata… lo apprezzerete dopo una giornata di camminate newyorkesi senza fine. 
Ottima qualità dei prodotti per la doccia ( non in tutti gli alberghi è così ).
È stata un’esperienza meravigliosa… ritornerò a NewYork e soprattutto ritornerò in questo Hotel. 
Staff eccellente!!!!!!

title: Excellent séjour à New York

text: The hotel have a great location in Midtown and is renovated, my room had a good design and a comfy bed. For a solo traveller the room size was perfect! The staff was really friendly speacilly Ruan! Would definitely stay there again
