Ho scelto questo albergo per la posizione, e confermo in pieno la scelta fatta.
Piccolo albergo ma molto carino.
Le stanze un po’ piccole, ma letti e cuscini molto buoni.
Pulizia molto bene!
La piccola sala da colazione disponibile a piano terra con la macchina per il caffè, a mio giudizio hanno aggiunto quella chicca che mi fa dire che ci ritornerei!

title: Best hotel in NYC, no doubts!
text:
I stayed in this hotel a few days last week and believe me, if you are looking for a clean place near to main attractions in New York, you will want stay there. 
The rooms are clean, the staff is amazing, everyone made me feel like I was in home but high marks to the manager Luljeta Veneski and the front desk agent Hektor Fistani.
This guys will do everything to make your stay memorable.
Definitely I will come back and choose this hotel again for my stays in New York.
Keep this good job. Thank you so much for everything.

title: Zeer goede keus in New York
text: Zeer net hotel, centraal gelegen in de wijk Murray Hill. Prima locatie, dichtbij de metro gelegen. Zeer vriendelijk en behulpzame medewerkers. Comfortabele - niet te grote - kamers, die dagelijks schoon worden gehouden. Aan de voorzijde van het hotel is het uitzicht prima en geeft direct het New York gevoel. Nespresso apparaat op de kamer en een simpel maar smakelijk self service ontbijt is dagelijks gratis beschikbaar voor de gasten. Wel bijtijds arriveren want op=op! Verder is er gedurende de dag gratis Starbucks koffie beschikbaar in de foyer op de begane grond. Al met al niets dan lof over dit hotel. Absoluut een aanrader voor uw vakantie.

title: The best in NY
text:
Hotel novo, vistas maravilhosas (Empíre State Building / chrysler Bulding). 
Uma cortesia de oferta de pequeno almoço (máquina da Starbucks com café, late,…), bagel’s, croissants, manteiga, compota).
A localização é excelente, rua sossegada mas equidistante a 10 minutos a pé de vários sítios de interesse. 
Para transportes tem a Central Station a menos de 5 minutos.
Funcionários são de uma amabilidade, com especial destaque para o Ricardo (recepção), e Marlene (pequeno almoço).
Espaços com decoração sóbria e sempre esmeradamente limpos.
Excelente relação qualidade/preço. 
Sem dúvida, na minha opinião a melhor opção em NY.

title: Wonderful stay in NYC
text: A new hotel, clean and full of services. Ten minutes walk from Rockefeller center and Empire state building and five minutes from Grand Central and New York public library. Hosts were kind and friendly and our room was completely soundproof.

title: A team at your service in a perfect hotel in the heart of the big apple!
text:
We stayed at this hotel in the heart of Midtown Manhattan for 13 nights and have absolutely no regrets! 
This is one of the cheapest hotels on the square, for a great location 5 minutes walk from : 
- Bryant Park Station
- Grand Central Station
- The empire state building 
- The Chrylser Tower... 

For us who did not want to spend our stay in the transport, it was ideal, we could make a big part by walking. 

Concerning the staff, all the people working in this hotel are there to help you and make your life easier. 
- Very pleasant and respectful maids 
- The breakfast lady is adorable, always smiling and concerned about your needs 
- The technical team is present at the slightest concern 
- The receptionists are true professionals who bend over backwards to meet your expectations. We would like to thank especially Ricardo, a man full of energy who knew how to help us when we needed it, to understand us and who always took the time to advise us, a big thank you! It is thanks to all these people that our stay was a huge success, thank you to them! 

We recommend 100% this hotel, if you want to live the madness of Manhattan during the day while being able to rest without a noise in the evening, it is the hotel that you need!

title: No “CÉU”…em Nova Iorque!
text:
Estivemos alojados neste fantástico hotel, de dimensão ideal, com quartos muito agradáveis e  confortáveis, espaços comuns com uma decoração muito requintada.
Muito bem localizado, central, mas sem o ruído característico da zona (excelente insonorização). Perto das principais atrações da cidade e transportes (central station).

Todo o staff é muito prestável e simpático, com destaque para o Ricardo (recepção) e a Marlene (auxiliar nos pequenos almoços).

Pequeno almoço gratuito! 
Possui uma sala interior e uma outra exterior, ambas requintadas, equipada com uma máquina de café multifuncional (maquina Starbucks), água, leite, manteiga, compotas, mini croissants e Bagels.

Foi uma excelente opção qualidade/preço ficar no Pestana Park Avenue.

title: Grande hotel!!
text: Estivemos uma semana no hotel e foi incrível. Ótima localização, super central e o staff é muito prestável e simpático. Perto das principais atrações da cidade e transportes, como o metro. Incrível. Voltaremos sempre!

title: Time of our life!
text: I stayed with my girlfriend at Pestana Park Avenue. Immediately after entering the building we were greeted very friendly. We had a wonderful room on the 26th floor with a view over the city! The room was clean, the bathroom had everything we needed and the bed slept amazingly. The location in New York is also perfect for exploring the city. It was our first time in New York and the staff at Pestana made it the time of our life!!!

title: Wonderful, clean hotel! Perfect for a NYC stay
text:
We had a lovely time at the Pestana Park Avenue hotel for a two-night stay! The rooms are immaculate - cleanliness is the most important thing to me when traveling and it was spotless. 

Ricardo, the manager, was wonderful and gave me an upgrade to a bigger room after a long flight back from Peru. When I called for extra towels and a set of silverware, they were brought up immediately and the woman was super friendly. Though I wasn't up early enough for the coffee and pastries, I think it's great they offer it and something you don't see that frequently.

The hotel is located on a quiet street and walking distance to so many attractions. Will absolutely stay there again!

title: Simply Loved It!
text: Surprise! Surprise! ... a quick, last minute trip to New York and chose this hotel on the fly and when I arrived I simply loved it. Great location, clean, comfortable rooms (excellent use of space), loved the bed! and lovely and effective personnel to assist you through the duration of your trip. High marks to Ricardo, what a special young man. Thanks again,   Elena L

title: Great hotel and perfect location
text: Pretty and super-clean hotel located in the heart of Manhattan. From the hotel it is possible to reach on foot many of the various touristic attractions in NYC and also real close to the Grand Central Terminal. Friendly and helpful staff. Perfect for traveling solo. Free coffee available the whole day: definitely a plus :-) !!

title: A melhor estadia, staff impecável!
text:
Localizção fantástica, bem como condições e serviços de qualidade.
Além dos quartos agradáveis e espaços comuns confortáveis, o staff do hotel é de uma simpatia genuína e presta um serviço irrepreensível!
Viajei em trabalho e quase me senti em casa com tamanha simpatia.
Recomendo muito.

title: Best service and hotel
text: This is an amazing hotel, super clean, has amazing rooms, and the staff are amazing. I arrived early from my flight and they gave me free early check in. I didn't expect that at all. Then on my check out, I asked for 2 more hours, due to my flight's schedule, and they let me free of charge to stay longer. In the lobby there is 24/7 coffee machine with great coffee, and they serve small breakfast for free (pastries, bagels etc). . I will definitely come back to this great hotel!

title: Excelent service
text:
We've stayed 5 days. Ricardo was very pleasent, very helpful and extremely nice.
The rooms were clean and well soundproofed. The hotel is well located.
Hopefully we will come back again! 
It has coffee, tea, baggels and croissants available every morning - for free.
Also, it is a Portuguese Hotel and have a picture of my town's typical gold pieces, from Viana do Castelo in the Lobby, so that's an extra point! :D

title: My NYC trip
text:
I absolutely love the Pestana and this love affair goes back to my experience with the hotel in Portugal. They take care of you upon arrival. They are helpful, aware of your needs to rest and relax and make it  their  mission to meet those expectations.
The staff are superb!

title: Genial!!
text: Muy buena ubicación, gran atención de todo el personal del hotel. Habitación muy completa, aunque no hay armario nos fue suficiente con los cajones y perchas. El café y los bollos de cortesía para el desayuno son un gran detalle para comenzar la mañana. Sin duda, repetiríamos.

title: Mala experiencia
text:
El hotel es lindo, esta bien ubicado, el problema es el personal.

De cierta manera nos sentimos estafados, al llegar nos dicen en la recepción que habíamos reservado un cuarto con cucheta. Rarísimo ya que en la pagina (reservamos directo por su sitio) no mostraba fotos de cucheta ni decia que tenía cucheta. Estábamos en un viaje de aniversario por lo que era realmente imposible que hubiésemos reservado una habitación con cuchetas. Luego de discutir con la persona del lobby nos dicen que la siguiente categoría de habitación no estaba disponible, aunque el cambio a esa categoría lo habrían realizado gratis, como no tenían nos dijeron que teníamos que pagar para cambiar de habitación. Terminamos pagando 250 dólares extra para cambiarnos de habitación.

De verdad no tenía sentido que nos hicieran pagar, pero en el momento uno se desespera y accede.

La razon por la cual pongo 3 estrellas y no 1 es porque a pesar de todo el hotel es muy bonito. Tengan cuidado a la hora de reservar la habitación!!

title: Great managers make a nice hotel even better
text: Ricardo was a gentleman when I asked for a room.  He was pleasant, polite, helpful and friendly.  The hotel room lived up to the same characteristics.  Great little jewel hidden away and in a bustling location.

title: Excellent Stay
text: The rooms were nice and clean, the hotel was in a prime spot, and service was great. You are always greeted upon re-entering the hotel. Our room had a great view of the surrounding area. There were several great bagel shops nearby, and it is close to the 5th Avenue stores, Times Square, and the Empire State Building.

title: Buena ubicación, buen servicio , habitación muy compacta,buen desayuno
text:
La atención excelente, en la parte de recepción destacó la atención deRicardi q fue de invarolable ayuda siempre, igualmente, todo el equipo de recepción atento
Tengo que destacar también a Marylin, siempre sonriente y dispuesta a atenderte de Sebastián 
Vilveria

title: Quick weekend trip
text: I booked for two nights but due to my flight cancellation and delays I called to let them I was coming in late due to my situation which I have no control over… I didn’t get to check until 12:30am the next day and I asked Barry the over night front desk guy why I still get charged for nights when I only stayed for one night plus resort fees for both nights $20 per night when I was only there for one night Sunday so that was frustrating but now let’s go to the pros I liked how clean the room is has plenty of USB chargers all around and the rainfall shower head! The room is super tiny but if it’s just me alone it works for me and it’s convenient to grand central station and Vanderbilt walking distance! I like how you get free water and coffee and they have free pastries in the morning!

title: EXCELENTE!
text: Hotel confortável, limpo e muito bem localizado!!! Possui máquina de café e um pequeno café da manhã  de cortesia (raridade em NY). Funcionário Ricardo extremamente educado e prestativo.  Recomendo!!!!!

title: Pleasent stay
text: We  stayed at Pestana Park Avenue for a week some days ago. The staff was super cute and welcoming, the location was amazing to visit the entire city (even on foot) and the room was very clean and tastefully furnished. I would recommend for sure this hotel to others!

title: Great Central Hotel for City Break
text:
This modern boutique hotel offers a great base for a NY stay. 
Rooms+ big comfy bed, walk-in shower, TV with YouTube connection, A/C kept the room temperature comfortable.
Rooms- no wardrobe to hang clothes up, only hanging pegs. However, there is good drawer storage under the bed (which is easy to miss)
The 'grab 'n go' concept worked well. The seated kitchen has a coffee machine, cold water dispenser, kettle, toaster and fridge containing milk/butter/cheese/jams etc, all for use by the patrons. Fresh pastries and bagels were provided each morning, but don't be down too late for breakfast. (Alternatively, buy your own breakfast and eat in).  There is an excellent Whole Food Supermarket at the bottom of Bryant Park (10 minute walk) where you can get everything you need.
Without exception, the staff were lovely. Reception staff were always available to answer a question or offer help.
With the hotel located on 39th St, bus and metro services are no more than 5 minutes walk away, Times Square 15 minutes walk, lots of bars, diners and cafes nearby.
Would we stop there again? Absolutely.

title: Perfect hotel for New York
text: It was our first time in New York and we spent a long time researching hotels and finally settled on Pestana. We stayed for seven nights. It was the most perfect hotel for us. Check in was easy, Ricardo on the front desk was superb for our whole stay. We stayed in room 401. It was so quiet, clean and great use of space, loads of storage. The rooms were serviced daily. There is no bar or restaurant but you can get your coffee and bagels in the morning and sit in the lounge and plan your day. It is perfect for Grand Central station and there is quite a few Irish bars nearby for a drink. it is quite a quiet area compared to some parts of the city but it is so easy to go everywhere from there.  We are already planning our next trip and the manager showed us the bigger suite rooms which look fantastic.

title: Ótima escolha!
text: Hospedagem excelente. Ótima localização limpeza e serviços (próximo de metrôs, e do Bryant Park) . De fato não há do que reclamar. Colaboradores prestativos, nos ajudaram a nos sentir em casa auxiliando-nos no que fosse necessário.  Destaque para o colaborador Ricardo que fala português e foi muito gentil e prestativo conosco. Hotel novo: banheiros e quartos modernos, com forte chuveiro e televisão Smart. Eu e minha namorada gostamos bastante da escolha e sem dúvida voltariamos novamente.

title: First time in New York
text: My partner and myself had a week long stay in the Pestana Park Avenue hotel and could not have been happier with the service we received. Upon arrival they offered us the choice between the city view room which was booked or a slightly larger room at no extra cost, all the staff were incredibly friendly and helpful and the cleaning staff always did an amazing job cleaning the room each day. The location was perfect as it is within easy walking distance of several iconic buildings, it is surrounded by amazing places to eat and even when we ventured further out it was easy to get a cab right out front of the building. And to top it off, as I was writing this review waiting to leave for our flight home the staff member on reception came over and gave us some beautiful souvenir tiles to remember our stay. I couldn't recommend this hotel enough for couples or somebody traveling solo, it was a joy to stay here and we're very sad to be leaving!

title: Gran hotel
text:
Un hotel muy bueno, es mi segunda vez que lo visito y quedo muy satisfecho como la primera vez. Ubicado muy cercas de muchas atracciones y la atención de Gregori, Ricardo y lucia muy bueno. 
La próxima vez que visite New York sin dudarlo me volveré a quedar aquí.

title: Buen hotel en buena zona
text:
Personal del hotel muy atento y amable. 
Desayuno mejorable, aunque es un servicio ofrecido por el mismo hotel sin incluirlo en el precio de la habitación. 
La habitación funcional, aunque algo pequeña. 
Muy buen servicio de limpieza.
WiFi muy buena.
Está cerca de estación de Grand Central (trenes y metro)

title: Excellent Boutique Hotel in mid-Manhattan.”
text: We spent four nights in this very friendly hotel all members of the staff were excellent we went for a room with a balcony and the views were amazing everything worked as it should the bed was so comfy one of the things we both liked was we could go about our business without any interference from the staff they were there if we needed them but not too much pomp as you often find in a hotel of this calibre we wouldn't hesitate to return and wish you all the best.

title: Good Price, Convenient Area, Very Clean
text:
For our purposes, the location was perfect...5 minute walk to Grand Central Station and easy walking distance to Times Square, Madison Square Garden.  

The hotel and the room itself were spotlessly clean.  Staff was super friendly and helpful.

We booked a "superior room".  Note that while it met our needs it is VERY tight for two people.  No closet and for more than a few days this may make things a little too close for comfort.  They offer what's called a "cozy room" but I can't imagine how much cozier things could get.  The sink/mirror are in the room itself right next to the bed, while the shower and the toilet are in their own space right next to the sink.  This is not a complaint....looking again this is obvious in the photos on the website so that was our oversight.

Would we stay again?  Absolutely, but if we were doing more than 3 nights we'd have to upgrade to something larger.

title: Excelente pedida
text: Excelente opção nos melhores locais de Manhattan! Perto da Grand Central, o que ajuda muita na mobilidade pela cidade! Entre Madison e Park avenue! O Ricardo Sousa da recepção é um destaque especial no hotel! Super atencioso, mas todos são muito gentis! O quarto é super limpo, cama maravilhosa! Banheiro com chuveiro perfeito! O quarto é pouco pequeno, não tem armário, mas nada que não consigamos dar um jeito para ficar neste hotel com atendimento primoroso e privilegiando a localização

title: New York with family
text: Equipe espetacular, limpeza, segurança, cordialidade, quarto confortavel, novo, chuveiro fantástico. Especial destaque a Ricardo da recepção que é português e fala ingles e espanhol muito bem. Muito bem localizado, ao lado da Grand Station. Quarto é para um casal e não é para família ou duas pessoas com varias malas.

title: The prices matches a five star hotel. But for their standards they are poor.
text:
Alright so I went to the hotel and they have trouble checking me in. I don't travel a lot since I have cerebral palsy. I have a debit/credit card with a higher limit on the debit side but they couldn't figure out to use debit (or let me choose from the terminal. 

They offered to clean my pants free of charge cos they deemed me poor. However they charged for that when they found out that I choose to leave after a couple of days instead of the nine I booked. 

The hotel is ok great and service is fine for the most part But they are mostly corrupt and use their own overpriced Portuguese drivers to drive me to the air port when I asked for a cab.

There's no real breakfast included and the price is the same as the cheapest 5 star hotel, with quite a few other five stars at just a slightly higher price. 

I'm not sure it would have made much of a difference since this was my first trip and I also came unprepared with no mobile data but It would have been more convinient if I had the option for debit since they charge you anyway for cleaning they offered to do for free. 

The hotel is nice but could use closets space and better offerings for the price

title: Hotel cómodo
text: Hotel con cama cómoda y limpio, céntrico. Habitación pequeña, solicitamos otra más grande por que no podíamos guardar ni la ropa de las maletas. Nos la ofrecieron por 400$ más. Una estafa. Estábamos de luna de miel, ni un solo detalle. El desayuno inexistente (solo café). Dejas cosas en la nevera y se las llevan. Habitación a un patio interior de la planta 8. Los recepcionistas solo hablan inglés, del español olvidate. No nos explicaron absolutamente nada de NY ni de la zona, claro como van a explicar si no saben ningún idioma más que el suyo...

title: Vacaciones Mayo -junio 22
text:
El hotel está muy bien ubicado , muy cerca de las principales atracciones . El hotel es cómodo , limpio y tiene todo nuevo .
La atención de Gregory es excelente siempre atento a las necesidades de los huéspedes , lo mismo Ricardo y Raquel . Volveremos pronto !!

title: Little gem of a hote in mid-Manhattan.
text: Small but well-appointed and clean rooms, excellent for a brief stay in a great location in mid-town. The staff is friendly and prompt to help with any issues. There's a restaurant at the hotel, but I never used it services.

title: Not completely satisfied
text: Currently staying here for two weeks, no long term amenities, complimentary upgrade or even meaningful upgrade rate offered. Room in front of dental practice (wink hello). Cleanliness is somewhat okay, not for the price point. Good location, somewhat modern, great water pressure and complementary coffee.

title: Note Pestana NY
text:
Nous avons visitez la ville de New York City eu mai, nous avons adorez l’hôtel réservé pour l’occasion. Nous sommes situé à 2 pat de la gare central (Metro) et 15 min à pied de Times Square a 2 rue de la 5eme Avenue. 
L’hôtel est vraiment très bien situé, propre, vue sur la ville à préférer une chambre en hauteur (28 étages).

title: Comentario.
text:
Quisiera dar un comentario sobre el hotel.
Cumple con las exigencias y la ubicación excelente. 

Con respecto a las personas que trabajan en hotel.

Una mención muy especial para Marilyn, por su excelente disposición y atención,  siempre dispuesta a ayudar y orientar,  preocupada de los detalles más mínimos. 
También mención a Ruan, Destiny, Emily y Giot por su atención muchas gracias.

Saludos.

title: Wonderful days in Pestana Park Anenue NYC
text:
Sehr angenehmes, kleines Hotel. Personal sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Die Balkonzimmer haben einen phantastischen Blick in die Stadt. Zimmer sehr sauber, klein, aber durchdacht. Tolle Lage. 5 Min Fußweg zur Grand-Central Station oder zum Bryant Park. Times Square erreicht man fußläufig in 15 Min. Kaffee aus einer Starbucks-Maschine und ein kleiner Frühstückssnack (Bagels und Croissants) waren bei uns inklusive.
Sehr empfehlenswertes Hotel!

title: Corazón de Manhattan, hotel cómodo
text:
Ubicación muy céntrica en pleno follón de Manhattan. La cama era cómoda y la habitación limpia. Había barra libre de café en el Lobby (muy buen café!) y por la mañana si bajabas pronto había croissants y bagels para desayunar (sin coste adicional). Nuestra habitación tenía un balconcito que era un puntazo (aunque desde fuera nos pareció ver que era la única con balcón! una suerte!). Había geles, crema hidratante, champú y acondicionador en abundancia (en tarro grande, para mi lo más cómodo!).
La única pega es que la habitación no tenía armario para guardar la ropa. El tamaño de la habitación era pequeño pero suficiente si hubiera habido un armario. Por lo demás, totalmente recomendable.

title: Highly recommended.
text:
The hotel is very pleasant to stay in. It's central location is close to grand central station (midtown) which makes it a great spot if you are staying in New York both for pleasure and business as I was.
Very clean, good service at the hotel and very nice staff. I stayed for a week.
The breakfast is bagels, croissants, coffee and fruit. That part could be a little better for the price.
I would recommend this hotel if you are traveling both as a single person as well as a couple. It feels very safe and I had a wonderful stay.

title: NOT MY FAVOURITE HOTEL
text: I stayed at this hotel for four nights from April 18th, the hotel is very small with tiny rooms. Continental Breakfast was  included which was a joke, a box on a table with pastries and no orange  juice to be found. I wanted milk for my coffee and there was none. The best point was it's cleanliness and the staff were quite helpful. However it is not a hotel I would stay in again.

title: WOW! Central Location. Great Team. Fabulous Room... 100% Recommend!!!
text:
When I visit a city I look for a hotel that is easy, boutique and in a great central location! Pestana ticks all the boxes. 

1) FAST - Hector checked us in within 5 minutes, showed us around, answered our questions and we were good to go! I love fast efficient service and Hector was amazing.

2) ROOM - The room has EVERYTHING you need. I particularly like the nespresso, fridge and the incredibly comfortable bed!! The views of New York and Madison Avenue were a bonus too!

3) TEAM - Every staff member I met was incredibly fun, polite and approachable. All smile. All make you feel welcome. I particularly love Lilly at the front desk. She is a lot of fun and very professional. Every hotel needs a Lilly!

4) LOCATION - You cannot get better! 2 mins from Grand Central, Madisons Ave and Empire State Building. We saved so much time and money by staying here because everything was walkable!

5) OTHER BENEFITS - Great coffee machine. Easy to grab a taxi outside. 40 mins from JFK.

I’d 100% recommend Pestana Park! You will love it. I did. I’ll be back again in a week or two when I return to NYC. Keep up the amazing work team!

title: Fantastic support whilst ill
text: The hotel is clean and simple. The location is excellent. My husband and I caught covid and the manager Lily was fantastic. She ensured we had everything we needed and regularly check in with us. She was really impressive.

title: Perfect for a long weekend
text: We were pleasantly surprised by how good our stay was here. It was in a good location for wandering around, shopping and Empire State Building nearby. The room was small so I wouldn’t stay much longer than a few nights but they had thought of every storage solution for a small space and the decor was great, all seemed quite new, clean and nicely decorated. Comfy bed, lovely shower, tea and coffee facilities, helpful staff with umbrellas on hand. I would definitely stay here again

title: NYC gem!
text:
A dreamy stay where all my needs were met...
Great central location with ideal parking right across street. Stunning rooms with views of the Empire state building. Albeit small yet so smart! Every luxury met... Who cares when you have a balcony...what a rarity in NY. Fabulous memorable views!
Enjoyed the Starbucks coffee all day long downstairs and croissants in the morning.
Lovely boutique vibe supported by a great staff.
Lilly and company provided a stay beyond welcoming... I will be back over and over again!
Good people there... as I forgot my favorite jacket in room. Sent back to me within a couple of days! Thank you Nerma.

title: Real good hotel in busy NYC
text: Clean and tidy rooms, sober aesthetics and fine decoration, excellent location, helpful and pleasant staff. I booked the cozy room without really knowing that it was small and beds "superposed" but then the staff helped find me a more suitable room which was very comfortable. I stayed 5 nights. I will return. I only wished the price/room was all inclusive so that one could budget better. but this is the case everywhere in NYC

title: Sconsigliato!
text: Camera minuscola e senza armadio. Lavandino separato da bagno e servizi. Prima colazione inesistente. C'e' solo una piccola sala dove si trova una macchina che eroga bevande calde 24/7/ A parte cio' verso le 7 vengono riempiti due vassoi con 6 cornetti (contati) e 7 muffins (contati anche quelli) che non verranno piu' riempiti fino all'indomani. Per anticipare il nostro check in di 5 ore, alle 6 am invece che alle 11 am ci hanno chiesti 145 USD quando per una notte richiedono 156$!!!

title: really lovely hotel
text: I had such a nice stay at the Pestana.  Staff was extremely kind and hotel was so clean and welcoming.  The rooms are definitely on the small side, but I found it very cozy and warm.  Bed/linens were great quality and I loved having a n'espresso machine in the room.  I would absolutely stay here again.

title: Wonderful Boutique Hotel near Grand Central
text: This small hotel is a real gem in New York. Close to Grand Central and walking distance to Times Square, theatres and shopping, the staff is friendly and welcoming. The rooms are new although the building isn't. Because of Covid there was only a continental breakfast when we stayed there(pastries and coffee).

title: Lovely hotel in a great location
text:
Really lovely hotel in a great location, within walking distance to most mid town attractions.
Room was small, but comfortable, clean, nicely decorated. Our only complaint would be the shower could fluctuate in temperature, and the heating/air conditioning was loud when turned on, hence why 4/5* 
We would stay at Pestana again, and would recommend to a friend (:

title: Great location, beautiful hotel and really nice staff
text: I was there for five nights with my wife. It's a great location, beautiful hotel and amazing view for the superior rooms with street view. I had some trouble with noisy and unrespectful neighbors the first and last night. The staff and the manager were really nice and did everything they could to compensate us. I recommend!

title: unprofessional room service
text:
Location was great, resfaurants and attractions nearby mostly walking distance.
Front desk were warm and welcoming, rooms were tiny for the price you pay for.
Room cleaning was inconsistent, stained duvet turned it upside down so it won't be visible but saw it though,
the next day 2 girls cleaning my room but didnt wash the glasses, hairs on the bed, under the duvet probably never checked it, holes and stain on pillows
3rd day stay still didn't change sheets
bathroom smelled weird
the latina girl who checked our room was unprofessional, didn't knocked on the door and barge in while i was still in bed. she was talking loudly with someone on the phone. didnt even apologize, instead just showed a stop hand signal
happened thrice with the same girl, she never knock when she checks room.
and oh, floors was sticky too

title: Dissappointing
text:
Not great. Check in was clunky and rooms were pokey even by NY standards. Room was also very cold. When I turned the heating on it made a noise too loud to sleep through. I had to choose between being warm or being able to sleep.
 The cherry on top was receiving an extra invoice a couple of days after my stay for my mini bar usage (I hadn't even looked at the mini bar). Sick of this type of scam at hotels.

title: Feel happy and save money
text:
The room was very clean. The furniture and building are new. The best part I liked about the room is no carpet. The front desk staff were very nice especially Destiny. 
They have a 24/7 complimentary starbucks coffee machine. The complimentary morning pastries were great. They stored our luggage upon checkout.

The rooms is small which kind of NY type. 
One issue which we had was that the sink was outside the bathroom, however, they changed our room twice to get a one which has a sink inside the bathroom. I will go back for sure.

title: Comfy safe and nice view
text: Great room, Nespresso a lovely touch. Great products in the bath. Receptionist was friendly. Breakfast was unexpected and added value to the stay. Great location in safe central neighborhood. Nice view out my window.

title: Un sueño
text:
Pasamos 5 noches en este hotel, en la habitación con balcón, y la verdad es que es un sueño dormir y despertarse con esas vistas, aunque tenemos opiniones encontradas, por que? nosotros reservamos esto con mucha antelación y nos costaron 5 noches 1300$, después a los pocos meses la misma habitación costaba más de 3.500, precio que si que no pagaríamos aún con esas vistas.

Por el precio que pagamos nosotros es una auténtica pasada, sí que es verdad que la habitación no es muy grande, pero para qué más, una cáma comodísima, una tv, un baño pequeño pero muy limpio y debajo de la cama hay cajones para guardar la ropa.
La ubicación es muy buena, tienes la estacion central y el summit a 2 calles, bryant park serán 8 minutos y central park 10, se puede hacer todo andando perfectísimamente.
Por poner alguna pega pondríamos 2: la insonorización de las habitaciones y que el aire suena muchísimo, por las noches teníamos que apagarle porque era muy incómodo.
En definitiva, si volvieramos a encontrar una oferta como la que conseguimos, sin duda alguna nos volveríamos a alojar ahí.

title: My trip to NYC was saved by Pestana Park Avenue.
text: Luljeta (Lily) Veneski and Alexa Nunez were absolutely amazing. They were accommodating, kind, understanding, and just straight great human beings. A bunch of NYC events were canceled for us and we decided to leave early. I tried getting refund from Expedia but was having troubles. Luckily, Lily and Alexa were kind enough to help process a refund for our unstayed nights. SHOUTOUT TO LILY AND ALEXA!!!!

title: Mr
text: Bon hôtel. Cependant plusieurs points négatifs : personnel de la réception très désagréable ++ et attention si vous réserver une chambre standard vous aurez droit à un lit superposé (nous ne le savions pas avant l’arrivé à l’hôtel) et on vous demandera de payer un supplément pour avoir une chambre avec un grand lit. La climatisation est extrêmement bruyante. Les points positifs : excellent emplacement, chambre bien décorée mais de petite taille, belle vue et ensoleillement agréable dans les chambres.

title: Very unhappy
text: I am still waiting on a response for a formal complaint that I submitted regarding my fully refundable deposits I paid on arrival for two rooms which I have not yet received back, I was advised by reception on arrival that the tax had all been sorted and that all I had to pay was a refundable deposit for both rooms, this wasn't the case and I am still waiting on a refund and had no response from my emails I have sent. Please don't be mislead by this hotel.

title: Mais que um fim‑de‑semana não corresponde.
text:
Fazer uma reserva por 6 noites em Manhattan procurando um Hotel (não alojamento), de 4 estrelas, significa que se procura algo mais para além do básico, cama e quarto onde descansar os ossos…
A localização de um Hotel em Park Avenue, com preços a condizer, do Grupo Pestana, deixa antever a qualidade e o serviço do Grupo.
Mas não.
O Pestana Park Avenue, em nada se assemelha a um Pestana;
O lobby do Hotel minúsculo, a condizer com o tamanho dos quartos, todos com o lavatório fora da casa-de-banho, ou ao lado da cama ou da porta, ou pior, para quem fica 6 noites quartos sem um único roupeiro ou armário; temos direito a duas gavetas debaixo da cama que não se podem abrir porque as malas estão encostadas à parede onde as gavetas abrem.
A água do banho não mate mantém a temperatura constante ou seja, varia entre o quente e o frio.
No exterior indica-se a obrigatoriedade de utilização de máscara dentro do Hotel; mas nenhum colaborador da receção usa!!!
Não se percebe.
Pior, ninguém informou que existe pequeno almoço disponível no hotel. Descoberta feita por acaso numa das últimas manhãs… 18,5$ por pessoa.
Relevante para quem viajou de outro Pestana onde não há pequeno almoço por força da pandemia!!! 
Não se percebe.
Pese embora se tenha pedido na reserva a emissão de fatura específica, e do pedido estar no Hotel, não foi possível a emissão da mesma, em qualquer momento. Argumento: o sistema em uso nesta unidade não permite alterações… enfim.
À chegada apesar de estar na reserva e de ter pago o suplemento para ter vista da cidade foi-me atribuído um quarto com vista para uma parede. Depois de reclamar foi atribuído novo quarto.
Pestana Park Avenue serve como Hotel de fim‑de‑semana e não mais, por não apresentar condições para tal.

title: Great location
text: Close enough to lots of attractions & the Grand Central Station which made it very accessible. It was on a quieter street which we appreciated as it didn't get the traffic sounds. Room was small, but really clean. Overall, we enjoyed our stay at Pestana.

title: Vacaciones
text:
El mejor hotel en New York hasta ahora. 
Limpio, tranquilo, excelente servicio, ubicación inmejorable, la cama muy comoda y lo que más valoré fue un early check-in y un late check-out, mas aún cuando vienes de 10 horas de vuelo

title: the bed, the sheets, the room, the nice staff.
text: the staff at Pestana make me feel like I'm home. I go to their hotels in Portugal and in NYC I always stay at Pestana Park Ave. Great manager, lovely desk staff and the mattress is extraordinary. I was lucky to have a high room, so great views too.

title: Pleasant stay
text: The rooms where very clean and the hotel is extremely well located! On a quiet street but very close to many popular tourist attractions. The staff is very nice and accommodating. We were able to do an early check in and we’re given a little gift for our anniversary.

title: Special request
text: I ask for a nice view and kindly they offered me a beautiful room.  I loved the location close to Grand Central Station.  Everything is clean and new.  The give away was a nice bottle for cold beverages.

title: Fantastic Experience
text:
We had the most amazing time at this hotel. The location is wonderful - super accessible and picturesque nearby but generally quiet. The views from our room were stellar. The entire hotel is sparkling clean and well-kept and we were really happy with the rate to experience ratio. 

Gregory and Alexa at the front both went above and beyond multiple times during our visit to look things up for us, recommend excellent spots, and make our stay great. One day in and we had already decided we will never stay anywhere else next time we’re in the city. Can’t wait to be back.

title: First visit to USA
text:
Location is very good.
Cleanliness is excellent.
Room is small.
Facilities is good.
Price is very good.
Staff are helpful.
My daughter was very happy with this hotel but for me the room size is not comfortable enough.
I don’t know if it’s New York standard? but I stayed in Chicago and Washington and room size was better.

title: Space-efficient jewel in mid-town
text: This hotel was very conveniently located 11 minutes' walk from Grand Central station. The hotel is low-key but very clean and the rooms are very thoughtfully appointed. This won the award for efficient use of space, but still, everything you needed was there. The fixtures were beautiful and modern, the bed was comfy and the sheets soft and comfortable. Even more, they cleaned our room in between day one and day two, which was a welcome surprise during the pandemic (unlike many hotels that don't clean until you leave). Highly recommend.

title: Mixed Bag
text:
This hotel has a lot going for it BUT follow through and substance are lacking. 

Pros 

Great quiet location close to Grand Central
Elegant tasteful designer touches 
Brand new building 
Comfy bedding and toiletries 
Powerful shower 

Cons 
Easy Requests not honored nor mentioned 
Pestana membership perks not provided 
Customer service hit or miss 
Very cramped space 
No closet 

Before check in I had requested a feather pillow on their website. Upon check in we received apathy or maybe it was merely distraction from the gentleman checking us in. 

No engagement whatsoever or our complimentary water. We live locally, I even mentioned we were just in town for a show and a night out. 

Upon check out, Gregory was a breath of fresh air and provided us water. He was engaging and friendly. 

Anyway, I’ve stayed at many hotels around the city, I think at this price point you could do better, you could do worse but in this part of town put this on your option list for a safe not great bet.

title: Great Boutique Hotel, Location and Staff!
text: Great boutique hotel with modern rooms and a great staff. Location is perfect to explore all areas of the city. Would definitely stay here again. My family had a total of four rooms… the staff upgraded us every chance they got. Looking forward to hopefully visiting again over the holidays!!

title: Be aware of hidden charges
text: I stayed in this hotel  - The Pestana Park  - for nine days, I would recommend it except for the complete rip off room charging system they have. Be very careful!!! Despite being a member of the Pestana ‘family’ and the so called 10% (We had stayed at the Lisbon branch and really loved it which is why we chose the NY branch) they charged me a different rate EVERY day – including a nonsensical rate for a mid week day. When I challenged this the front desk told me it was the computer who decided /!! BTW They also have a hidden charge of 20 dollars a day they tell you about at the desk that’s not even advertised – this is for a off site gym that even if you don’t want to use you’re charged for anyway! Very bad treatment of someone who otherwise would have been a loyal customer. The so-called glamorous courtyard had trash cans in it and the small common area was like a bad office space, front lobby is nice however. In the room no microwave, tiny bar fridge, coffee and tea NOT renewed every day, and the liquid soap etc not great at this price. Also the staff don’t wear facemasks, this includes in the elevators and there was no checking of vax certificates of guests – overall - expensive and underwhelming.

title: Disappointing
text:
I wanted to like this hotel. The price was right, the location was good, and the rooms looked nice. The good news is that's all true. And if you are on a high floor and face the right direction, you actually get a good view of NYC.

However, I had to move rooms several times. My first room didn't have hot water in the shower, and all three rooms oddly smelled like cigarettes (despite being many floors apart). I think there's something seriously wrong with their ventilation system. 

Also, they had a daily resort fee of ~$20 (they may have called it something else) that wasn't disclosed clearly when booking the room; I only found out about it when I got there.

All-in-all, it was a disappointing stay.

title: Welcoming Hotel
text: As soon as we walked in we were greeted by the staff and made to feel welcomed.  We arrived early before check-in but they were able to provide us with a room right away and didn't make us wait like other hotels have in the past. The lobby and our room was spotless and decorated nicely.  I felt at ease right away.  The room was compact but they made great use of the space.   Overall it was a wonderful stay and I highly recommend.  I'm a single mom traveling with kids and this hotel was within my budget but felt like luxury.

title: liked hote; wanted to love but comes up short
text:
This is an almost new hotel.  It was pupose built (not a conversion).  

Plus my room on the 12th fl in the back was one of the quietest rooms I've ever had in NYC. Negative being on the back I faced another buidling which was perhaps 15-20' away (I swear I could read the computer in the office across the way!) It was also very dark (can't imagine the lower floors); so dark that I could almost not see the sky at all to know whether the sun was out or it was cloudy.  Positive. This room had outlets and USB ports galore more than enough for two people. Negative. I was in the Classic room and It would have been difficult to imagine two people comfortably in this room (can't imagine the cozy room!).  In addition there was no desk but a small coachlike bench with a laptop table. clever use of space but that worked for one; can't imagine what would happen if there were two.  Storage. There were two drawers under the bed and enough room to fit my suitcase underneath too. Negative there was no closet just some pegs on the wall which you could put hangers on; this worked Ok for one in the summer but can't imagine two in the winter! 

The room design was attractive and the bed was very comfortable. The shower and toilet were in a separate room but the sink was in the bedroom. There was barely enough room for one person's toiletries certainly not for two (sense a theme?).  

As I said so much to like about the hotel but on almost every point for each postive there was a limiting negative.

title: Quality hotel
text: Quite and cozy room. I really rested during my stay.  Room is just enough for 1 person as it is smaller to the average hotels but the excelent wifi compensates everything.  Shower is quite good and shampoo & soap of good quality.

title: Awesome place!
text: Loved the modern, clean and quite room also it was small which is not an issue since I was  out and about anyway most of the time. Staff was excellent and very helpful. Will definitely stay there when I come back. Location was great many things like Empire State Building, Grand Central Station, Times Square, Bryant Park are  in walking distance.

title: Not for anyone who wants a good night sleep.
text:
Absolutely adorable new room.  I was upgraded to a city view (which I could care less about - All I wanted was a quiet room).  This was my 1st night alone in 2 years since having a baby (moms out there who get their 1st night alone only want a good night sleep)..
A good night sleep was impossible as I heard my next door neighbors conversation starting when I arrived back at the room - until 10:30pm - and then again when they returned and their door closed and they were chit chatting until 1am.  So a good night sleep was not an option.  Now, the shower - I love a good hot shower.  Unfortunately when someone flushed a toilet, the water pressure was non existent and it went from cold to piping hot.  Why is there no garbage pail or tissues in the room?  If you’re visiting and not worried about a good night sleep and don’t need space (I wouldn’t recco for a couple with plans to stay more than 2 nights as there is no closet) - then this is a clean and centralized choice.  Otherwise, I’d find someone else to stay.  P.s. I called downstairs 3 times to get a room change (or to see if I can get a quieter room) as I realized my night was doomed by the room next door by 9pm.  No one answered.  I also waited to be ask how my stay was during checkout  - he just tapped on the keyboard and said I’m all set.

title: Quick trip to New York City
text:
We had to go to New York to run an errand. We booked this hotel due to the proximity to the location we needed to visit. The location of the hotel (39th and Madison) is excellent. Two blocks from Bryant Park, three blocks from Grand Central and 5 blocks from the Empire State Building. 
The rooms are a little small but extremely clean. If you aren't spending much time in the hotel and are mostly out and about this will not be an issue. There is no kitchen so there is no food available at the hotel. 
The only issue we had was the every-time the A/C turned on it was very loud in the bathroom.
The staff is very friendly and always willing to help, be it with directions or being the housekeeper changing the sheets or leaving extra coffee for our Nespresso machine.

title: Great stay!
text: Hotel is super clean and rooms are very nice. Will definitely stay here again. Enjoyed the big bed and clean space. The lobby had tea and coffee and they even let us extend our checkout to 12pm since our flight was later!

title: Awesome Stay
text: My Son and I stayed in this Hotel for 5 days. It is a very charming boutique hotel; the rooms are small, but the distribution of space is such that we manage to make it comfortable also very clean. The manager, an Albanian woman, was very nice and accommodating to our early check-in.  The location is also excellent, being close to 5th Avenue and Central Station, with numerous restaurants nearby.

title: Awesome boutique hotel!!
text: The Pestana was so beautiful, clean, friendly and attentive. The rooms are very trendy and styled well. All staff were kind and courteous. The place is immaculate!! I love that they are eco friendly. Tons of outlets/usb ports. I would definitely recommend them, and I’ll certainly be back for another visit. The only downside is no on-site restaurant or bar, but hey, it’s NYC, you only have to walk a few feet in any direction to get to food and drinks!!

title: Cozy, Comfortable Stay
text: Recently enjoyed 4 nights at the Pestana Park Avenue. The central location made getting out and exploring the city easy. The room was cozy and comfortable - best suited to those who plan on being out and about. The bed was particularly soft and welcoming after long days of walking around. The rooms are well-designed to maximize space. The newness of the hotel made this a real find. Check out CAVA across the road for a quick/affordable/delicious take-out option and bring it back to eat on the hotel's back patio. It's a cute little oasis.

title: Excelente
text: Es un hotel que volvería visitar sobre todo por la ubicación y la tranquilidad es un hotel nuevo, está dos cuadras de gran central Station, mucha tranquilidad de las habitaciones, el servicio es excelente de todos en especial de Marilyn que nos ha brindado una ayuda y un trato muy cálido muchísimas gracias por todo

title: Back to NY
text:
Excellent service and location. 
Can do many things just walking g distance from the hotel, especially nice areas of Bryant Park, Fifth Avenue and Madison Avenue.

Very clean and organized.
A pleasure to return. It was my second time there.

title: Great Location and Comfortable Stay
text: I booked this hotel last minute and couldn't be more pleased. The location is convenient and the staff is accommodating and kind. Marilyn assisted me during my stay and was available for all my needs. Rooms are clean and offer all the amenities needed. I recommend upgrading to a city view room. They are bright and spacious for NYC!

title: The service will blow you away- Best I have had EVER in NYC!
text: Every once in awhile, you have a hotel experience which provides absolutely everything you need and does not bog you down with stuff you don't.  And they do it with charm, grace and style.  This is what I just experienced at The Pestana Hotel Park Ave.  EVERYONE here has been incredible.  From the front desk to housekeeping, every employee went out of their way to make sure I was taken care of.  Hospitality is in the details and The Pestana has thought of everything.  From the wonderful smelling soap at the sink, beautiful comfortable bedding, incredible views of the city and a shower which was closer to a massage.  Everything has been Just amazing.  And this is in the midst of Covid, where the amenities are limited.  They have made up for it with kindness and attention to detail.  Highly recommend!

title: Best Hotel in NYC near Grand Central
text: WOW I love this hotel. My friends and I went for my birthday to NYC and I stumbled upon this hotel because I thought the aesthetic was super cute and the location is super convenient to the train station. First impressions walking in, LOVE. The front desk staff was amazing shout out Ricardo, Gregory, and Marilyn. So sweet and so accommodating during our whole stay. At night we were in search of water and Gregory went in all the rooms to find us water bottles and even brought up our food that was delivered by Uber Eats. He was amazing, they all were amazing. The rooms very clean and so nicley decorated inside. The views 10/10. Thanks Pestana on Park Ave for helping make my birthday amazing!!!!

title: Sound woke me up; apathetic GM
text: loud sound coming from bathroom woke me up. became increasingly louder throughout night. unable to sleep. sounded like a vacuum cleaner above me or a laundry machine buzzer going off every 5 minutes. asked to speak to general manager who was completely apathetic. luckily housekeeper manager was told (thanks to marilyn at front desk! who is lovely) and i was refunded partially. for the disturbance of sleep and attitude of gm (he didn’t apologize; attitude was that i was annoying him when i was completely polite), i will not return.

title: Outstanding Hotel; Exceptional Service
text: My husband and I stayed here for my birthday, and the staff went above and beyond to make our stay as special and relaxing as possible. They gave us a room with the most beautiful view of the Empire State Building that was just pure magic to look out at every night! The room was cozy and had a lot of space solutions that made it comfortable. Cleanliness was also top notch. We’ll definitely be staying here again!

title: a little taste of europe
text: peaceful, tasteful, and clean. really nice staff. great atmosphere. sucked that i couldn't get Netflix on the tv or connect it to my device. price on my confirmation and amount i was charged was different which is a bit deceptive.

title: Great view and location
text: My teenage daughter and I spent 2 nights in Pestana and we both liked it so much! Everything was perfect- the room with balcony and the best view to the city, the style of the room, the shower, big windows. Room service was also perfect. Everything new and clean, very friendly stuff, great location. Bryant park just around the corner. And Great pictures that you can make in the balcony - my daughter was so excited about that.

title: Amazing, remodeled Property
text: This property was overall amazing.  I booked through booking.com and was not required to pay anything upfront.  I was coming into the city early around 10:30 am and I call the property to see if early check in would be available a nice gentleman told me that he could not guarantee early check in but that bag drop off would be available so I could enjoy the city without my bags.  We got to the hotel around 11am and was greeted by Sarafina she made the process super simple and was very nice. She was able to check us right in by allowing us an upgrade so it was nice to freshen up before going out for the day.  I knew instantly at that point the stay was going to be top notch.  The lobby is very modern and clean.  The entire check in process took less than 5 mins.  There is a $50 security deposit charge for each night you stay.  That was refunded to me within 2 days after check out.  The room is a good size for a NYC hotel.  The view was nice as well and equipped with full length mirrors, steamers, and refrigerator.  The bed was very comfortable sheets too.  I got the best sleep I had in quite some time.  It was nice there was an adjustable central air conditioning unit within the room since the windows barely crack open.  The shower was also very nice and clean.  We checked out with Marilyn and she was a true joy as well.  She was able to help me locate water and get us a bag for extra belongings we had acquired. LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION.  You are in walking distance of 5th avenue.  5 min walk to empire state building, 10 min walk to Times Square.  Very safe neighborhood.  There's a great Irish pub around the corner and across the Street is the Raines Law Room at the William (this is an amazing speakeasy experience make reservations beforehand as this is a HOT SPOT). I have no negative experience with this hotel and will definitely consider staying at this property for my next trip.

title: Two comfortable nights
text:
Pestana Park Ave had just re-opened, and they were happy to see us, pleasant, and super helpful.  They were happy to answer 
The Cozy room is small, it’s true, but well designed and entirely fine for 2 people in the same family. 
Comfy mattresses and bedding, and a great shower. 
Hard to beat the location.

title: Adorei!!
text:
Estava com algum receio porque o hotel tinha acabado de inaugurar. Correu tudo lindamente! Staff incrível!!! Sempre muito solícitos, muito simpáticos. Literalmente no centro de todos os pontos de interesse. Estivemos uma semana e em cada dia e noite, fazíamos uma trajetória. Espero que estejam a conseguir ultrapassar este tempo horrível de pandemia ... merecem continuar! Recomendo vivamente.
Ana Gonçalves

title: Nice hotel with comfortable bed and great location!
text:
I was thrilled to find out this new hotel which opened in early 2020. I attended a corporate training which was blocks away from this hotel. 

Room -  the room is clean and tidy: a queen-size bed, tables on either side, tv, bench with a portable desk, coffee and tea available, a small fridge, a bathroom with a toilet and standing shower, a bathroom sink and mirror right at the entrance, and closet hook hangers on the wall. The hotel has a plastic-free policy, so you will not find any plastic utensils or bottles in the room. There are recyclable water bottles for you to refill water served on the first floor. 

Food - They offer an online menu where you can order food and have it delivered to your room. 

Gym - They partner with Blink Fitness centers in NY. Guests can get their daily gym pass from the front desk and work out in any nearby Blink locations. 

Service - The front desk reception staff greets their guests every time they enter the hotel. 

Price/value - For the price you pay, you get a reasonable value out of the stay. They are located in between Time Square and Mid-Town. I was satisfied with the value considering the average hotel room space and service in NY.

title: New York stay
text: Had an amazing stay with Pestana. Location was perfectly situated and the staff were more than happy to help with any questions we had for our first time visiting New York. Will definitely be heading back.

title: Excellenet hotel
text: Friendly and very service oriented staff, a comfortable room well equipped, very clean premises, and in every way Nice, great location! This hotel is outstanding when it comes to welcoming guests. I travel a lot, and pestana Park Avenue was to me a special experience in a positive way.

title: Modern, fresh, friendly and most importantly CLEAN!
text:
After booking a hotel within a package deal (prior to Pestana) without reading the reviews (which were terrible, I'm talking hotel from hell levels) I opted not to take the chance and book the newly opened Pestana. 

This turned out to be the BEST decision I could have made for me and my fiancé on our holiday to NYC... we were greeted with a very friendly hostess and check-in was very quick.

Yeah sure the room is small & cosy for sure but couldn't be cleaner if they tried which was our main concern. The bed is huge & amazingly comfortable plus it's silent to sleep in peace after a long ass day in the city.

Everything is really modern and the shower room is nice and hot. 

46" Smart TV is a great touch and free wifi too.

The room was cleaned every single day with fresh towels given and if we needed any more it was just a phone call and they were brought right up. 

Small fridge, safe and a coffee machine is also in the room which is nice!

The only drawback is lack of space for your clothes as there isn't a wardrobe so we just kinda lived out the suitcase, not the biggest issue in the world to compromise with is it!

The location is SECOND TO NONE! A few blocks from Grand Central Station. You are so close to everything but not staying in what I ended up calling "the zoo" (Times Square) I could only imagine how annoying that would have ended up being if we stayed there.

The price was exceptional for what you get from the service, to the cleanliness, the bed, the location. Would recommend over & over and we would 110% love to return in the future!

title: Beautiful, modern, clean, great location
text: Had a great stay at the Pestana. Location was perfect, walking distance to everything we needed and parking nearby. Staff was courteous and professional. Bed was very comfortable and bathroom shower was wonderful.  Room was very modern and tastefully decorated, was a decent size and had all the amenities we needed.

title: Even 'Superior' Room way too small, some other new hotel issues
text: Booked a Superior City room expecting at least some space. That was a mistake. Room was WAY too small for more than 1 person or 1 night. Bed was comfortable, shower was amazing, very high pressure. But a lot of little nigs that you find at a new hotel - only one towel provided in the room for example and no way to get another. Even assuming they work out the kinks I wouldn't come back if I were staying more than 1 night given the absurd (even for New York) room size.

title: Pestana Park Avenue
text: Clean and decent. Nice bathroom. Friendly staff. Central location. Right hotel for a first-time visitor to New York because of its proximity to the Central Station, shops, library and other landmark buildings

title: Great room, great price, great location1
text: My wife and I stayed here in February for one night. They had just opened that week and everything went very well. The rooms are small, but very cozy. Perfect for a couple ready to enjoy to town. The bed was large and very comfortable. The room very quiet and we had a great night's sleep. We paid for breakfast and the food was very good, the quality better than what you get for free at the chain hotels. We definitely will stay here again. The location, the price, the room, and the staff were all great.

title: Chambres exiguës à 150 $ TTC la nuit
text:
Récemment ouvert,donc flambant neuf, l'hôtel bien placé et situé à 10 minutes à pied de la Gare Centrale et du metro - est plus proche de Madison avenue que de Park avenue. Déception : la chambre 1503 qui nous a été attribuée sensée être de catégorie supérieure est exiguë (lavabo dans la chambre), avec pour seul rangement disponible l'espace à bagages sous le lit. La ventilation (clim. et chauffage) particulièrement bruyante, étant un motif suffisant pour changer de chambre, nous fûmes transférés vers la 1204 aux dimensions identiques mais avec le lavabo dans la salle de douche cette fois.
Points positifs: excellente literie, grand écran TV (mais sans chaîne francophone), frigo + cafetière avec capsules Nespresso à disposition.

title: Grand Central Location
text:
Small and cozy rooms, nice personnel, close to subway and transportation, good view from room.
Water running a little slow and air condition a little loud.
Good with a safe and refrigerator in room.
Clean towels and bed every day.

title: Super comfy and cosy, staff are fantastic!
text: Stayed here mid February for my girlfriend’s birthday. From check-in to check-out the staff were exceptional. Both helpful and friendly it was a great first impression especially after a long flight! Excellent location, beautiful decor in the room and the cleanliness is 10/10. The beds are really comfortable as well just what you need for a good rest after a busy day exploring the city. We will be staying here again for sure. Huge thank you to the staff for making our trip more special!

title: Hôtel plus que parfait avec des prix plus que raisonnable
text: Très bonne hospitalité et accueil du personnel. L’hôtel était propre, beau. Il est très bien positionné entre Times Square et là Grand Gare Central. Si besoin de quoi que ce soit l’hôtel est à votre disposition et vous servira au plus vite

title: Disappointing
text:
New hotel in a great central location. 
Booked it based on our previous stays in pestana hotels ,I’m my opinion the only thing this hotel has in common with its sister hotels is the name ! 
Room was not serviced on our second night having left at 8am to return late to find our room as we left it ,
On returning home discovered that €18 had been taken from my a/c ,After 3 emails I was told it was for bar items in the room ,A bag of nuts and a bottle of water,As pestana gold members we are entitled to a bottle of water for our stay .This has gone back and forth but life is to short .

So yes it’s a shiny new hotel in a nice quite part of town and close to sights ,
But based on this stay we won’t be back to this hotel ,But will definitely back to NY in Sept with the kids .Loved the city pity about the hotel .

title: excellent but not if you travel with lots of luggage
text: This is a new establishment at a very handy location close to the Grand Central Station. However rooms are crumped by an oversized bed and no space for luggage and no practical wardrobe for the clothing. The bathrooms are clean, modern, good shower but no hooks or railings to hang the towels (except for a hand towel). Nespresso coffee mas=chine is a welcome benefit.

title: Newly built hotel but with severe maintenance problems
text:
We stayed 2 nights at this hotel for a weekend visit to NYC. At the time of booking, there were no reviews since it hadn't opened yet, but we decided to stay here thinking it was brand new so there shouldn't be any problems. However, our room had no hot water at all, water pressure was minimal, and I was very disappointed in how uninterested hotel staff were to help us resolve this.

Upon reporting the shower situation during the first night, staff promptly came up to look at it that night, and said they will get maintenance to fix it the next day. They were fully booked so they couldn't switch us to another room. We had no choice but to take a freezing-cold shower - totally unacceptable when staying at a hotel.

After returning from a long day touring the city the next day, we found that we still had no hot water. Staff said maintenance already looked at it, and said they'll call maintenance to investigate again, but they are offsite and unavailable until the next day. When asked about switching to another room, they once again said they were completely full and this was the last room remaining.

Fed up, I called the online travel agency we booked the stay through to explain the situation and see if they could help correct this. After they directly contacted the hotel to confirm the issue, staff suddenly were much more helpful and a new room of the same base tier was magically available for us. It shouldn't have taken a call to our travel agency to get our issue fixed, but I regret not calling the first night to avoid taking a freezing cold shower.

Avoid this hotel if you can - they have their share of quality issues in their brand-new hotel. When lining up to check-out, I've overhead another couple complaining to the front desk about a non-functioning toilet, and they were given the same spiel about how they were fully booked.

Pros:
- great convenient location; walking distance from Grand Central station.
- they allowed us to drop off our bags early in the morning before check-in.

Cons:
- as mentioned above, no hot water in first room and was very frustrating to get staff to either fix or move us to another room.
- water pressure in shower was low (in both rooms).
- wifi was painfully slow.

title: Excelente!
text: O hotel é excelente, com uma localização soberba a apenas alguns minutos da 5.ª Avenida, Times Square, Empire State Building e outros locais de referência. Staff super atencioso, simpático e disponível. Acomodação limpa e extremamente confortável!

title: New York State of Mind
text: Brand new boutique Hotel in the Murray Hill district. Perfect spot for a weekend getaway to enjoy NYC. Great bars and cafes all close by. Walking distance to the great library, central station, empire state building, Chrysler Building

title: Amazing Staff
text: I loved this hotel. I took my first visit to NYC with my girlfriend for her birthday. This place literally made our trip 10x better. Alex and all of the rest of the staff were super friendly and helped us navigate the city. Please keep this staff, they made this hotel experience better. Super clean. From Kedrick!

title: Sehr schönes Hotel in perfekter Lage
text:
Unser Zimmer war sehr schön eingerichtet, stilvoll dekoriert und sehr sauber. Die Zimmer sind etwas klein, aber für ein Zimmer in Manhattan ist das völlig okay.
Es gab keinen Kleiderschrank, aber dafür Laden unter dem Bett um Kleidung und diverses zu lagern.
WLAN war in den Zimmern kostenlos verfügbar.
Das Hotel hat eine perfekte Lage in Midtown Manhattan - unmittelbar in der Nähe sind Starbucks, Pret a Manger und der Grand Central (Bahnhof). Auch zum Times Square und zur Fifth Avenue ist es nicht weit.
Das Personal war sehr freundlich und man hat sich im Hotel sehr Willkommen gefühlt.
Nach unserem Check out konnten wir unsere Koffer bis zur Abreise noch lagern.
Wir würden das Pestana Park Avenue auf jeden Fall weiterempfehlen. :-)

title: Cute convenient hotel near Grand Central
text: This was a nice little spot, it doesn't have a restaurant or food service and the room is small (not too shocking for the area) so thats something to consider but in the location you can order from a lot of places. The staff was friendly and helpful and efficient. I would definitely recommend.

title: New Hotel in town
text: Very nice new hotel in Midtown. Small, but practical room, with amazing Empire State view (book a balcony room). Very friendly receptionists, especially Alex & Kaylee- who always great you with the smile.

title: Mis
text: Rooms were amazingly clean and staff was welcoming with great smiles . Hotel is brand new and has great views as well .subway near by with many options to for food and see the city as well . Would definitely recommend and hope to be back soon .keep up the good work !

title: Outstanding boutique hotel!
text: Newly opened boutique hotel. Rooms are small, but very clean and beautifully designed. Our stay felt private and quiet, because there are only 4 rooms to a floor. The staff was consistently attentive and friendly, and the hotel manager Alex went above and beyond to assist. Location is excellent— only 3 blocks from Grand Central. All around outstanding experience.

title: Cosiness in midtown Manhattan
text:
My stay here was short, but soooo nice!
As stopping by in NYC I chose to stay in this newly opened hotel and had great experience!
I was lucky to be the one of the first guests to stay here and was pleasantly surprised. Hotel has very cute small quiet rooms with beautiful decor and all the necessities and mattress was one of the best i have slept in. 
Alex (hope i remembered the name correctly, he answered all my questions)))) and the whole team at the reception were very accommodating and made sure my short stay was amazing. I will be definitely back!
